T06srabhu_u:9: de dag ni rkyen rñed kyaṅ ruṅ ma rñed kyaṅ ruṅ ste /

T06srabhu_u:18: rkyen gtso bo gaṅ źe na /

T06srabhu_u:25: rkyen dman pa gaṅ źe na /
T06srabhu_u:27: rkyen dman pa ni maṅ ste /

T06srabhu_u:39: puruṣaś ca puruṣendriyeṇa samanvāgataḥ strīś ca /
T06srabhu_u:42: yathāpīhaikatyo madhyeṣu janapadeṣu pratyājāto bhavati, pūrvavad yāvad yatra gatiḥ satpuruṣāṇām
T06srabhu_u:47: aṅgapratyaṅgāvikalo vā yadrūpeṇāṅgapratyaṅgāvaikalyena śrotrāvaikalyādikena bhavyaḥ kuśalapakṣasamudāgamāya
T06srabhu_u:50: yathāpīhaikatyena tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye śraddhā pratilabdhā bhavati cetasaḥ prasādaḥ
T06srabhu_u:52: tatrāyatanaṃ tathāgatapravedito dharmavinayaḥ sarveṣāṃ laukikalokottarāṇāṃ śukladharmāṇām utpattaye /
T06srabhu_u:53: yā punar atra śraddhā tena pūrvaṅgamenādhipatyena sa āyatanagataḥ prasādaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:56: aparivṛttakarmāntatā katamā/ yena pañcānām ānantaryāṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ, tadyathā mātṛvadhāt pitṛvadhād arhadvadhāt saṃghabhedāt tathāgatasyāntike
T06srabhu_u:57: duṣṭacittarudhirotpādād anyatamānyatamād ānantaryaṃ karma dṛṣṭa eva dharme na kṛtaṃ bhavati nādhyācaritam iyam ucyate 'parivṛttakarmāntateti /
T06srabhu_u:58: imāni pañcānantaryāṇi karmāṇi kṛtopacitāni dṛṣṭa eva dharme parivartyābhavyo bhavati parinirvāṇāyāryamārgasyotpattaye
T06srabhu_u:60: svayam evānena sa ātmabhāva ebhiḥ pañcabhir aṅgaiḥ saṃpādito bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:63: tadyathā buddhānām utpādaḥ, saddharmadeśanā, deśitānāṃ dharmāṇām avasthānam, avasthitānāṃ ca dharmāṇām anupravartanam, parataś ca pratyanukampā //
T06srabhu_u:65: yathāpīhaikatyaḥ sarvasattveṣu kalyāṇahitādhyāśayam utpādya prabhūtair duṣkarasahasrair mahatā ca puṇyajñānasambhāreṇa [bskal pa graṅs med pa gsum gyis tha maḥi lus phyi
T06srabhu_u:66: ma]-ātmabhāvapratilambhe bodhimaṇḍe niṣadya, pañca nivaraṇāni prahāya,
T06srabhu_u:67: caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu sūpasthitacittaḥ, saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān bhāvayitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate /
T06srabhu_u:69: atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣv adhvasu evam eva [saṅs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad de kho na bźin du 'byuṅ ba yin no //]

T06srabhu_u:74: sadbhir ayaṃ dharmo niryāto deśitaḥ praśasto buddhaiś ca buddhaśravakaiś ca /

T06srabhu_u:78: deśite saddharme pravartite dharmacakre yāvac ca buddho bhagavān jīvati tiṣṭhati ca parinirvṛte ca buddhe bhagavati yāvatā kālena pratipattir na hīyate saddharmaś ca nāntardhīyate /

T06srabhu_u:85: para ucyante dāyakadānapatayah te yāni tasyānulomikāni jīvitopakaraṇāni taiḥ pratyanukampante, yaduta (Śbh I 16)
T06srabhu_u:88: yathāpīhaikatyas tathāgatasya vā tathāgataśrāvakasya vāntikād dharmaṃ śrutvā śraddhāṃ pratilabhate
T06srabhu_u:91: abhyavakāśaṃ pravrajya yan nv ahaṃ sarvaṃ kaḍatravargaṃ dhanadhānyahiraṇyaṃ cotsṛjya svākhyāte dharmavinaye samyag evāgārād anagārikāṃ pravrajeyaṃ, pravrajitvā ca pratipattyā saṃpādayeyam" iti /
T06srabhu_u:92: ya eva samutpannaś chandaḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu, ayam ucyate kuśalo
T06srabhu_u:95: yā tam eva kuśalaṃ dharmacchandam adhipatiṃ kṛtvā jñapticaturthena vā karmaṇopasaṃpac chrāmaṇeraśīlasamādānaṃ vā /
T06srabhu_u:99: prātimokṣasaṃvarasaṃvṛtaḥ, ācāragocarasaṃpannaḥ, aṇumātreṣv avadyeṣu bhayadarśī, samādāya śikṣate śikṣāpadeṣu /
T06srabhu_u:102: sa tam eva śīlasaṃvaraṃ niśrityārakṣitasmṛtir bhavati nipakasmṛtiḥ smṛtyārakṣitamānasaḥ samāvasthāvacārakaḥ
T06srabhu_u:103: sa cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā na nimittagrāhī bhavati, nānuvyaṃjanagrāhī, yato 'dhikaraṇam
T06srabhu_u:104: asya pāpakā akuśalā dharmāś cittam anusraveyuḥ, teṣāṃ saṃvarāya (Śbh I 18)
T06srabhu_u:105: pratipadyate, rakṣati cakṣurindriyam, cakṣurindriyeṇa saṃvaram apadyate /
T06srabhu_u:106: sa śrotreṇa śabdān, ghrāṇena gandhān, jihvayā rasān, kāyena spraṣṭavyāni,
T06srabhu_u:107: manasā dharmān vijñāya na nimittagrāhī bhavati nānuvyaṃjanagrāhī, yato
T06srabhu_u:108: 'dhikaraṇam asya pāpakā akuśalā dharmāś cittam anusraveyuḥ, teṣāṃ saṃvarāya pratipadyate, rakṣati mana-indriyaṃ, mana-indriyeṇa saṃvaram āpadyate /
T06srabhu_u:112: āharati, na darpārthaṃ na madārthaṃ na maṇḍanārthaṃ na vibhūṣaṇārthaṃ,
T06srabhu_u:113: yāvad evāsya kāyasya sthitaye yāpanāyai jighatsoparataye brahmacaryānugrahāya iti /
T06srabhu_u:114: paurāṇāṃ ca vedanāṃ prahāsyāmi, navāṃ ca notpādayiṣyāmi /
T06srabhu_u:115: yātrā ca me bhaviṣyati balaṃ ca sukhaṃ cānavadyatā ca sparśavihāratā ca /
T06srabhu_u:118: sa tathā bhojane mātrajño divā caṅkramaniṣadyābhyām āvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaś cittaṃ pariśodhayati
T06srabhu_u:119: sa rātryāḥ prathame yāme caṅkramaniṣadyābhyām āvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaś cittaṃ pariśodhya, tato vihārān nirgamya bahir vihārasya pādau prakṣālya,
T06srabhu_u:120: dakṣiṇena pārśvena siṃhaśayyāṃ kalpayaty pāde pādam ādhāya, ālokasaṃjñī smṛtaḥ saṃprajānann utthānasaṃjñām eva manasikurvan, sa rātryāḥ paścime
T06srabhu_u:121: yāme laghu laghv eva prativibudhya, (Śbh I 20) caṅkramaniṣadyābhyām āvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaś cittaṃ pariśodhayati. iyam ucyate pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ jāgarikānuyuktatā //
T06srabhu_u:124: saṃprajānadvihārī bhavati, ālokitavyavalokite saṃmiñjitaprasārite sāṃghāṭīcīvarapātradhāraṇe 'śitapītakhāditasvādite nidrāklamavinodane gate sthite niṣaṇṇe śayite jāgṛte bhāṣite tūṣṇīṃbhāve saṃprajānadvihārī bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:127: sa ebhir dharmaiḥ parikarmabhūmiṃ śodhayitvā viviktāni śayanāsanāny adhyāvasaty araṇyāni vṛkṣamūlāni śūnyāgārāṇi parvatakandaragiriguhāpalālapuṃjābhyavakāśaśmaśānavanaprasthāni prāntāni śayanāsanāni idam ucyate prāvivekyam //
T06srabhu_u:129: so 'raṇyagato vā vṛkṣamūlagato vā śūnyāgāragato vā pañcabhyo nivaraṇebhyaś cittaṃ viśodhayati, kāmacchandād vyāpādāt styānamiddhād auddhatyakaukṛtyād vicikitsāyāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:130: sa ebhyo nivaraṇebhyaś cittaṃ viśodhya vinivaraṇam samādhikalyatāyām avasthāpayati /
T06srabhu_u:133: sa pañca nivaraṇāni prahāya cetasa upakleśakarāṇi saṃkleśakarāṇi /
T06srabhu_u:134: viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viaharati /
T06srabhu_u:136: sa vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśamād adhyātmasaṃprasādāc cetasa ekotībhāvād avitarkam avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati /
T06srabhu_u:137: sa prīter virāgād upekṣako viharati smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan sukhaṃ ca kāyena pratisaṃvedayate yat tad āryā ācakṣate "upekṣakaḥ smṛtimān sukhavihārīti tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati sa sukhasya ca prahāṇād duḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvam eva ca saumanasyadaurmanasyayor astaṃgamād aduḥkhāsukham upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati /
T06srabhu_u:140: so 'nayānupūrvyā-uttarottarān viśiṣṭān viśiṣṭatarān viśiṣṭatamān pratyayān ātmasampatpūrvān samādhisaṃniśrayaparyavasānān samudānayati /
T06srabhu_u:141: evaṃ pariśuddhe citte paryavadāte anaṃgaṇe vigatopakleśe ṛjubhūte karmaṇye sthite āniṃjyaprāpte, sacet catvāry āryasatyāny ārabhya teṣāṃ parijñāyai
T06srabhu_u:142: prahāṇāya sākṣātkriyāyai bhāvanāyai parato ghoṣam avavādānuśāsanīṃ
T06srabhu_u:143: labhate, evam asau bhavyo bhavati pratibalaś ca yogavihitasya manaskārasyotpādanāya tatpūrvikāyāś ca samyagdṛṣṭeḥ, yayā catvāry āryasatyāny abhisamāgacchati, vimuktiñ ca paripūrayati, nirupadhiśeṣe ca nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāti /
T06srabhu_u:144: tatra yā samyagdarśanam upādāya vimuktiparipūriḥ nirupadhiśeṣaparinirvāṇaṃ cāyaṃ gotrasamudāgamo veditavyaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:145: tatrātmasaṃpadam upādāya yāvat samādhisaṃniśrayo 'yaṃ hīnaḥ samudāgamapratyayo veditavyaḥ
T06srabhu_u:146: tatra yaś catuḥsatyadeśanāvavādādhipateyaḥ parato ghoṣo yaś ca yoniśo manaskāraḥ, ayaṃ pradhānaḥ
T06srabhu_u:153: yāny aparinirvāṇadharmakasya liṅgāni tadviparyayeṇa gotrasthasya pudgalasya liṅgāni veditavyāni
T06srabhu_u:155: kāni punar aparinirvāṇadharmakaliṅgāni yaiḥ samanvāgato 'parinirvāṇadharmakaḥ pudgalaḥ "aparinirvāṇadharmako 'yam" iti vijñeyaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:159: ihāparinirvāṇadharmakasya pudgalasyādita evālayatṛṣṇā sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā ca sarvabudhdhair āśrayasaṃniviṣṭā aprahāṇadharmiṇī bhavaty anutpīḍyā dūrāgatā pragāḍhasaṃniviṣṭā /
T06srabhu_u:163: anekaparyāyeṇa saṃsāradoṣān vicitrān prabhūtāṃś ca śrutvā, nirvāṇaguṇāṃś cānekaparyāyeṇa vicitrān prabhūtāṃś ca śrutvā, parīttam api prapañce saṃsāre doṣadarśanam ādīnavadarśanaṃ
T06srabhu_u:164: saṃvegamātrakaṃ notpāditavān atītam adhvānam upādāya, notpādayiṣyaty anāgatam adhvānam upādāya, notpādayati vartamānam adhvānam upādāya,
T06srabhu_u:165: parīttakalāmātrakam avaramātrakaṃ nirvāṇe tṛṣṇākṣaye virāge nirodhe guṇadarśanam anuśaṃsadarśanaṃ prasādamātrakam atītānāgatapratyutpannam adhvānam upādāya notpāditavān notpādayiṣyati notpādayati idaṃ dvitīyam agotrasthaṃ liṅgam //
T06srabhu_u:170: yenāyam aghṛṇacittaś cāsaṃkucitacittaś ca prahṛṣṭacittaś ca sarvaṃ pāpam adhyācarati /
T06srabhu_u:171: na ca kadācit tan nidānaṃ vipratisārī bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:172: [gźi des tshe 'di'i zaṅ ziṅ daṅ bcas pa'i bdag ñid ñams pa kho na tsam du mthoṅ bar zad de /] idaṃ tṛtīyam agotrasthaṃ liṅgam
T06srabhu_u:175: sarvākāraparipūrṇe sphuṭe yukte citre gamake duḥkhaṃ vārabhya samudayaṃ vā nirodhaṃ vā mārgaṃ vā saddharme deśyamāne na labhate cetasa āvarjanamātrakam adhimuktimātrakaṃ ca /
T06srabhu_u:178: mchi ma bkrug ces byed pa thob par gyur pa lta ci smos te /] atītānāgatapratyutpannam adhvānam upādāya /
T06srabhu_u:180: (I)-A-IIl-e Ms.4a2M, Sh.18-7, P.9a2, D.8a1, N.9b1, Co.8b3, Ch.398b1
T06srabhu_u:182: sacet kadācit karhicit svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajati, sa rājābhinirṇīto vā, corābhinirṇīto vā, ṛṇārto vā bhayārto vājīvikābhayabhīto vā, nātmadamāya, nātmaśamāya,

T06srabhu_u:184: duḥśīlo vā bhavaty antaḥpūtir avasrutaḥ kaśaṃbakajātaḥ śaṃkhasvarasamācāraḥ, aśramaṇaḥ śramaṇapratijñaḥ,
T06srabhu_u:185: abrahmacārī brahmacāripratijñaḥ. atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣv adhvasv agotrasthasya pudgalasyaivam eva pravrajyā veditavyā /
T06srabhu_u:187: tad anena paryāyeṇānenābhisandhinārthato [rab tu byuṅ ba ma yin gyi rab tu byuṅ ba'i
T06srabhu_u:188: rtags daṅ cha lugs 'dzin pa tsam gyis rab tu byuṅ ba] iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /
T06srabhu_u:192: yat kiṃcit kuśalaṃ karma karoti kāyena vācā manasā vā, tat sarvaṃ bhavābhiprāyo vā viśiṣṭam
T06srabhu_u:193: abhiprārthayamānaḥ, bhogābhiprāyo vā viśiṣṭaṃ bhogam abhiprārthayamāno karoti /
T06srabhu_u:195: evaṃbhāgīyāni cāsya bahūni liṅgāni saṃvidyante yaiḥ samanvāgato
T06srabhu_u:201: gotra eva sthito nāvatīrṇo na niṣkrāntaḥ, gotrastho 'vatīrṇo na niṣkrāntaḥ,
T06srabhu_u:205: amithyāpratipannaḥ āvṛtaḥ, anāvṛtaḥ, dūre, antike, paripakvaś cāparipakvaś ca, viśuddhaś cāviśuddhaś ca //
T06srabhu_u:207: tatra katamo gotrasthaḥ pudgalo gotra eva sthito nāvatīrṇo na niṣkrāntaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:209: na ca punar adyāpi labhate satpuruṣasaṃsevāṃ vāgamya saddharmaśravaṇaṃ vā tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye śraddhāṃ, na śīlaṃ samādadāti, na śrutam udgṛhṇāti, na tyāgaṃ bṛṃhayati, na dṛṣṭim ṛjūkaroti /
T06srabhu_u:210: ayaṃ gotra eva sthito nāvatīrṇo na niṣkrāntaḥ //
T06srabhu_u:214: las] viparyayeṇa śuklapakṣeṇa gotrasthaś cāvatīrṇaś ca veditavyaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:215: ayaṃ tu viśeṣo no tu lābhī bhavaty āryamārgasya tatphalasya ca kleśavisaṃyogasya //
T06srabhu_u:217: katamo gotrasthaś cāvatīrṇaś ca niṣkrāntaś ca /
T06srabhu_u:218: etad evoktvāyaṃ viśeṣo lābhī bhavaty āryamārgasya tatphalasya ca kleśavisaṃyogasya //
T06srabhu_u:222: I 32) ālambane 'tyarthaṃ dhandhavāhīnīndriyaṇi bhavanti mandavahīni vā śrutamayena vā cintāmayena vā bhāvanāmayena vā manasikāreṇa saṃprayuktāni,
T06srabhu_u:223: yaduta śraddhā vīryaṃ smṛtiḥ samādhiḥ prajñā vā na samarthāni na pratibalāni dharmasya vā prativedhāyārthasya vāśu ca prativedhāya tattvasya /
T06srabhu_u:227: yasya nātyarthaṃ jñeye vastuny ālambane dhandavāhīnīndriyāṇīti sarvaṃ pūrvavad vistareṇa vaktavyam
T06srabhu_u:231: yasya pudgalasya jñeye vastuny ālambane 'dhandhavāhīnīndriyāṇi bhavanty amandavāhīni, śrutamayena vā cintāmayena
T06srabhu_u:232: vā bhāvanāmayena vā manasikāreṇa saṃprayuktāni, yaduta śraddhā viryaṃ
T06srabhu_u:233: smṛtiḥ samādhiḥ prajñā vā śaktāni bhavanti dharmasya prativedhāyārthasya vāśu ca prativedhāya tattvasya /

T06srabhu_u:439: avakrāmati, srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vānāgāmiphalaṃ vā sākṣātkaroti /

T06srabhu_u:2401: asmi kalyāṇavākyo vākkaraṇenopetaḥ, anye ca bhikṣavo na tathe"ty ātmānam utkarṣayati saṃpragṛhṇāti, parāṃś ca paṃsayati /
T06srabhu_u:2402: sa ātmānaṃ saṃpragṛhṇān ye te bhavanti bhikṣavaḥ sthavirā rātrijñā abhyavacīrṇabrahmacaryās tān na kālena kālaṃ paripṛcchati paripraśnī karoti /
T06srabhu_u:2403: te cāsya na kālena kālam avivṛtāni ca sthānāni vivṛṇvanti,
T06srabhu_u:2404: vivṛtāni ca sthānāny uttānīkurvanti, na ca gambhīram arthapadaṃ sādhu ca
T06srabhu_u:2405: suṣṭhu ca prajñayā pratividhya saṃprakāśayanti yāvad eva jñānadarśanasya viśuddhaye /
T06srabhu_u:2406: evamasya sa ātmasaṃpragraha āntarāyiko bhavati yaduta vipaśyanāyāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:2407: punar aparam alpamātrakasyāvaramātrakasya jñānadarśanamātrakasya sparśavihāramātrakasya lābhī bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:2408: sa tena jñānamātrakeṇa darśanamātrakeṇa (Śbh I 254) sparśavihāramātrakeṇātmānam utkarṣayati saṃpragṛhṇāti /
T06srabhu_u:2409: sa ātmānaṃ saṃpragṛhṇaṃs tāvatā saṃtuṣṭo bhavati, nottari vyāyacchate /
T06srabhu_u:2410: evam asyāntarāyaḥ kṛto bhavaty ātmasaṃpragraheṇa yaduta vipaśyanāyāḥ //
T06srabhu_u:2411: capalo vā punar anupaśāntendriyo bhavaty uddhatendriya unnatendriyaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:2412: sa dūṣitacittī bhavati durbhāṣitabhāṣī duṣkṛtakarmakārī, na sthiraṃ dharmāṃś
T06srabhu_u:2414: yena vipaśyanāṃ na pūrayati na viśodhayati /
T06srabhu_u:2415: evam asya cāpalyam antarāyo bhavati yaduta vipaśyanāyā iti //
T06srabhu_u:2416: N.63a7, Co.64b6, Ch.420c5 dvau dharmau śamathāntarāyau /
T06srabhu_u:2423: ayaṃ ca punar antarāyasya samāsārtha iti //
T06srabhu_u:2424: yaś cāyaṃ samāsārtho yaś ca pūrvako vistaravibhāgas tad ekadhyam abhisaṃkṣipyāntarāya ity ucyate /
T06srabhu_u:2431: yad dānam anavadyaṃ cittālaṃkārārthaṃ cittapariṣkārārthaṃ yogasaṃbhārārtham uttamārthasya prāptaye dadāti /
T06srabhu_u:2442: yaḥ svair eva pāṇibhir dadāti, ayam ucyate dātā /
T06srabhu_u:2443: yasya svakaṃ dīyate tac ca dātukāmasya nādātukāmasya, ayam ucyate dānapatiḥ //
T06srabhu_u:2450: kṛpaṇā vā, vanīyakā vā, adhvagā vā, yācanakā (Śbh I
T06srabhu_u:2451: 258) vā, andhā va, badhirā vā, anāthā vā, apratisaraṇā vā, upakaraṇavikalā iti /
T06srabhu_u:2455: tadyathā mātāpitaram, āpāyakaṃ, poṣakam, saṃvardhakam iti /
T06srabhu_u:2456: ye vā punar aṭavīkāntarād uttārayanti, durbhikṣād vā,
T06srabhu_u:2457: paracakrabhayād vā, bandhanād vā, ābādhād vā /
T06srabhu_u:2458: hitopadeśakāś cāsya bhavanti, sukhopadeśakā hitasukhopasaṃhārakāḥ, utpannotpanneṣu cādhikaraṇeṣu sahāyakāḥ sahanandinaḥ sahaśokāḥ, āpatsu cainaṃ na
T06srabhu_u:2463: ye saṃstutāḥ, yeṣām asyāntike bhavati prema vā gauravaṃ vā
T06srabhu_u:2464: / bhaktivādo vā alaptakāḥ saṃstutakāḥ sapriyakāś ca bhavantīti /
T06srabhu_u:2470: vigatadveṣāḥ, dveṣavinayāya pratipannāḥ, vigatamohāḥ, mohavinayāya pratipannā iti /
T06srabhu_u:2471: ye vā punar anye 'py evaṃbhāgīyāḥ ima ucyante viśiṣṭāḥ //
T06srabhu_u:2474: samāsataḥ sattvasaṃkhyātam asattvasaṃkhyātaṃ ca vastu dadāti /
T06srabhu_u:2477: yad vā punar anyad apy evaṃbhāgīyaṃ vastu /
T06srabhu_u:2478: adhyātmaṃ vā punar upādāya karacaraṇaśiromāṃsarudhiravasādīny anuprayacchati /
T06srabhu_u:2479: idam api sattvasaṃkhyātaṃ dānaṃ yatra bodhisattvabodhāḥ saṃdṛśyante /
T06srabhu_u:2480: asmiṃs tv arthe nedaṃ dānam abhipretam /
T06srabhu_u:2482: vaśitā ca prabhaviṣṇutā ca, arhati ca tān sattvān pareṣāṃ pratipādayitum /
T06srabhu_u:2484: na taddhetos tatpratyayaṃ pare manāṃsi pradūṣayanti /
T06srabhu_u:2485: ye ca sattvāḥ pareṣu pratipāditās te na vyāpāditā bhavanti /
T06srabhu_u:2492: yad vā punar anyad apy evaṃbhāgīyaṃ ratnaṃ vā hiraṇyaṃ vā rūpyaṃ vā vastraṃ vā bhāṇḍopaskaraṃ vā gandhajātaṃ vā mālyajātaṃ vā /
T06srabhu_u:2496: yat kiṃcid bhojyaṃ vā peyaṃ vā /
T06srabhu_u:2498: vā, godhūmā vā, kolā vā, kulatthā vā, tilā vā, māṣā vā, ikṣuraso vā, [dar
T06srabhu_u:2500: yad vā punar anyad 9) apy evaṃbhāgīyam /
T06srabhu_u:2508: yad vā punar anyad apy evaṃbhāgīyam /
T06srabhu_u:2510: tatra yac ca sattvāsattvasaṃkhyātaṃ vastu, idaṃ dadātīti //
T06srabhu_u:2513: yac ca tatsamutthāpitaṃ kāyakarma vākkarma deyavastuparityāgāya svasantāne vā parasantāne vā /
T06srabhu_u:2520: kālena dadāti yathaitat pareṣām upayogyaṃ syāt /
T06srabhu_u:2524: yena na pare sāvadyā bhavanti, nātmā /
T06srabhu_u:2526: vinīya mātsaryamalaṃ saṃnidhimalaṃ ca dānaṃ dadāti /
T06srabhu_u:2527: pūrvam eva dānāt sumanā dadaṃś cittaṃ prasādayati dattvā cāvipratisārī bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:2536: ebhir ākārair ato 'sya gṛhiṇo vā pravrajitasya vā cittālaṃkārārthaṃ cittapariṣkārārthaṃ yogasaṃbhārārtham uttamārthasya prāptaye tad dānam,
T06srabhu_u:2543: alpābādhaḥ, ārabdhavīryajātīyaḥ, prājñaḥ, alpecchaḥ, saṃtuṣṭaḥ, supoṣaḥ,
T06srabhu_u:2555: yathā śāstary evaṃ dharme sabrahmacāriṣu śikṣāyām avavādānuśāsanyāṃ pratisaṃstare 'pramāde samādhau /
T06srabhu_u:2559: yathābhūtam ātmānam āviṣkartā bhavati, śāstur antike vijñānāṃ ca sabramacāriṇām /
T06srabhu_u:2563: arogajātīyaḥ samayā pācanyā grahaṇyā samanvāgato bhavati, nātyuṣṇayā, nātiśītayā, avyābādhayā,
T06srabhu_u:2571: kartā bhavati vijñānāṃ sabrahmacāriṇāṃ kāyena vaiyāpṛtyam /
T06srabhu_u:2575: adhandhendriyaḥ, amūḍhendriyaḥ, aneḍakaḥ, ahastasaṃvācikaḥ pratibalaḥ subhāṣitadurbhāṣitānāṃ dharmāṇām artham ājñātum iti /
T06srabhu_u:2580: yāvadbhir guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bhavaty alpecchatām ādiṃ kṛtvā, taiḥ parato jñātuṃ na samanveṣate, kaścin me pare na jānīyuḥ,
T06srabhu_u:2586: so 'labdhvā cīvaraṃ lūhaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā notkaṇṭhati,
T06srabhu_u:2588: labdhvā ca punar araktaḥ paribhuṅkte 'sakta iti vistareṇa pūrvavat /
T06srabhu_u:2593: na tu pare, tadyathā dārakā vā manuṣyā veti, ye vā punar anye 'pi ke cid /
T06srabhu_u:2594: yeṣām arthāya yān paryeṣṭim āpadyeta, pare cainaṃ dāyakadānapatayo duṣpoṣyam iti paśyeran
T06srabhu_u:2616: ta ete piṇḍapātaṃ cīvaraṃ śayanāsanam ārabhya dvādaśakā dhutaguṇā bhavanti trayodaśakā vā
T06srabhu_u:2617: tatra piṇḍapātikatvaṃ bhidyamānaṃ dvidhā bhavati, prāptapiṇḍapātikaḥ sāvadānapiṇḍapātikaś ca //
T06srabhu_u:2620: ['dris pa'i khyim dag nas] yathālabdhaṃ yathopasaṃpannaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṅkte //
T06srabhu_u:2623: veśmānuveśya kulāni bhikṣitvā paryaṭitvā yathālabdhaṃ yathopasaṃpannaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṅkte
T06srabhu_u:2624: no tv uccaiḥ śuṇḍāṃ praṇidhāya kulāny upasaṃkrāmati /
T06srabhu_u:2627: tatra piṇḍapātikatvam aviśeṣeṇārabhya dvādaśa bhavanti prabhedaṃ punar ārabhya trayodaśa //
T06srabhu_u:2629: ekasminn āsane niṣaṇṇo yāvat paribhoktavyaṃ tāvat paribhuṅkte /
T06srabhu_u:2630: vyutthitaś ca punas tasmād āsanān na paribhuṅkte /
T06srabhu_u:2634: paribhuṅkte, yāvat sarvabhojanaṃ pratīcchati, yāvatā jānāti śakṣyāmi
T06srabhu_u:2636: yataś ca punar jānīte "na me 'ta uttari bhojanena kṛtyaṃ (Śbh
T06srabhu_u:2637: I 278) bhaviṣyatī"ti, tataḥ sarvaṃ parigṛhyārabhate paribhoktum /
T06srabhu_u:2642: trayāṇāṃ cīvarāṇām atirekam uttaraṃ na dhārayati /
T06srabhu_u:2645: yat kiṃcic cīvaraṃ dhārayati tricīvaraṃ vā,
T06srabhu_u:2651: yac cīvaraṃ parair muktaṃ bhavaty ucchiṣṭaṃ choritaṃ rathyāyāṃ vā, vīthyāṃ vā, catvare vā, śrṅgāṭake vā, pathi vā,
T06srabhu_u:2652: utpathe vā, uccārasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ vā prasrāvasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ vā,
T06srabhu_u:2655: sāram ādāya, śodhayitvā sīvitvā vivarṇīkṛtya dhārayati /
T06srabhu_u:2666: abhyavakāśe vāsaṃ kalpayati, anavacchanne vivṛte deśe /
T06srabhu_u:2669: śmaśāne vāsaṃ kalpayati, yatra mṛtamṛto janakāyo 'bhinirhriyate /
T06srabhu_u:2672: mañce vā pīṭhe vā tṛṇasaṃstare vā niṣadyayā kālam atināmayati /
T06srabhu_u:2673: no tu mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā kuḍyaṃ vā vṛkṣamūlaṃ vā tṛṇasaṃstaraṃ vā niśritya pṛṣṭhaṃ vā pārśvaṃ vā dadāti /
T06srabhu_u:2677: yasmin tṛṇasaṃstare vā parṇasaṃstare vā śayyāṃ kalpayati /
T06srabhu_u:2678: tṛṇasaṃstaraṃ vā parṇasaṃstaraṃ vā sakṛd yathaiva saṃstṛtaṃ bhavati tathaiva śayyāṃ kalpayati
T06srabhu_u:2679: no tu punar vikopayaty abhisaṃskaroti ca /
T06srabhu_u:2682: tadyathā, ūrṇā vā karpāsaṃ vā yasmin samaye
T06srabhu_u:2683: dhutaṃ bhavati saṃkṛttaṃ vicūrṇaṃ tasmin samaye mṛdu ca bhavati laghu ca karmaṇyaṃ ca, yaduta sūtrābhinirhāre vā tūlābhinirhāre vā /
T06srabhu_u:2684: evam evehaikatyasya piṇḍapātapātarāgeṇa piṇḍapāte cittaṃ saktaṃ bhavati
T06srabhu_u:2685: saṃsaktaṃ, cīvararāgeṇa cīvare cittam saktaṃ bhavati saṃsaktam,
T06srabhu_u:2686: śayanāsanarāgeṇa śayanāsane cittaṃ saktaṃ bhavati saṃsaktam /
T06srabhu_u:2687: sa ebhir dhutaguṇair viśodhayaty ṛjūkaroti, mṛdu karmaṇyam ārjavam āsravaṃ
T06srabhu_u:2705: pratiśrayarāgasya prahāṇāya vṛkṣamūlika ābhyavakāśikaḥ śmāśāniko bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:2706: api ca śmāśānikatvaṃ mithunarāgasya prahāṇāya bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:2711: prāsādikenābhikramapratikrameṇa samanvāgato bhavati, ālokitavyavalokitena saṃmiñjitaprasāritena sāṃghāṭīcīvarapātradhāraṇena /
T06srabhu_u:2716: tatra pratigrahe mātrāṃ jānāti evaṃ mātrajño bhavati //
T06srabhu_u:2718: uccakulapravrajito vā sann āḍhyakulapravrajito vābhirūpo vā darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko bahuśruto vākkaraṇenopetaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:2719: anyatamānyatamasya vā jñānamātrakasya darśanamātrakasparśavihāramātrakasya lābhī sann etena nātmānam utkarṣayati parāṃś ca paṃsayati /
T06srabhu_u:2720: [chos daṅ rjes su mthun pa'i chos 'ba' źig bsgrub par bya ba kho na yin par rig nas /] nānyatra (Śbh I 288)
T06srabhu_u:2736: sa cāyuṣmān kṣamo bhavati śītasyoṣṇasya jighatsāyāḥ pipāsāyā daṃśamaśakavātātapasarīsṛpasaṃsparśāṇām, parato duruktānāṃ durāgatānāṃ
T06srabhu_u:2738: śārīrikāṇāṃ vedanānāṃ duḥkhānāṃ tīvrāṇāṃ kharāṇāṃ kaṭukānām amana-āpānāṃ prāṇahāriṇīnāṃ kṣamo bhavaty adhivāsanajātīyaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:2741: yathāpi tan maitreṇa kāyakarmaṇā samanvāgato bhavati, maitreṇa vākkarmaṇā, maitreṇa manaskarmaṇā, śāstur antike vijñānāṃ ca sabrahmacāriṇām /
T06srabhu_u:2742: sādhāraṇaparibhogī ca bhavati, apratibhogī ca bhavaty apratiguptabhojī, lābhair dhārmikair dharmapratilabdhaiḥ, (Śbh
T06srabhu_u:2743: I 290) pātragataiḥ pātraparyāpannaiḥ/ śīlasāmānyagataś ca bhavati,
T06srabhu_u:2745: sa ebhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ saṃrañjanīyair dharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ priyakaraṇair gurukaraṇair avivādakaraṇaiḥ,
T06srabhu_u:2753: sa ebhir dharmaiḥ samanvāgato dharmakāmo bhavati, guṇakāmaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:2759: sa "yat tad bhavati kavitaṃ kāveyaṃ citrākṣaraṃ cihnapadavyañjanaṃ lokāyatapratisaṃyuktam, tan nirarthakam" iti viditvā,
T06srabhu_u:2760: ārāt parivarjayati, na teneyate, na tena prīyate /
T06srabhu_u:2766: "mā me tato nidānaṃ bhaviṣyaty anekaparyāyeṇa vyākṣepād vyāpāro vā teṣāṃ vā punar
T06srabhu_u:2769: utpannotpannāṃś ca kleśopakleśān nādhivāsayati, prajahati, vinodayati,
T06srabhu_u:2771: "mā me 'tonidānam utpadyate dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ sāṃparāyikaṃ ve"ti /
T06srabhu_u:2772: śraddhādeyaṃ ca na vinipātayati, acyutaśīlaḥ, abhraṣṭavrataḥ, śraddhādeyaṃ paribhuṅkte /
T06srabhu_u:2779: āpannaś ca laghu laghv eva yathādharmaṃ (Śbh I 294)
T06srabhu_u:2781: itikaraṇīyeṣu ca dakṣo bhavaty analasaḥ svayaṃkārī /
T06srabhu_u:2783: buddhānāṃ ca buddhaśrāvakāṇāṃ cācintyam anubhāvaṃ, gambhīrāṃ ca deśanām
T06srabhu_u:2784: adhimucyate, na pratikṣipati, "tathāgatā eva jānakāḥ paśyakāḥ, nāham" iti
T06srabhu_u:2785: viditvā, na ca svayaṃdṛṣṭiparāmarśasthāyī bhavaty asamañjasagrāhī duḥpratiniḥsargamantrī
T06srabhu_u:2786: sa ebhir guṇair yukta evaṃvihārī evaṃśikṣamāṇaḥ śramaṇālaṃkāreṇālaṃkṛtaḥ śobhate /
T06srabhu_u:2787: tadyathā kaś cid eva puruṣo yuvā maṇḍanajātīyaḥ kāmopabhogī snātānulipto 'vadātavastraprāvṛto vividhair bhūṣaṇair alaṃkṛtaḥ śobhate,
T06srabhu_u:2788: tadyathā harṣair vā keyūrair vāṅgulimudrikayā vā jātarūparajatamālayā vā /
T06srabhu_u:2789: evam eva sa ebhir vividhaiḥ śramaṇālaṃkārair guṇair alaṃkṛto bhāsate tapati virocate /
T06srabhu_u:2801: laukikaṃ caiva vairāgyaṃ tathā lokottareṇa ca /
T06srabhu_u:2802: tayoś caiva hi saṃbhāro bhūmir naiṣkramyasaṃjñitā // [4]
T06srabhu_u:2806: tatra kati pudgalā ye 'syāṃ naiṣkramyabhūmau yathādeśitāyāṃ yathāparikīrtitāyāṃ niṣkrāmanti
T06srabhu_u:2854: yasya pudgalasya mṛdūnīndriyāṇi dhandhavāhīni mandavāhīni jñeye vastunīti pūrvavat /
T06srabhu_u:2858: yasya pudgalasya tīkṣṇānīndriyāṇy adhandhavāhīni bhavanty amandavāhīni jñeye vastunīti pūrvavat
T06srabhu_u:2862: yena pudgalena pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu rāga āsevito bhāvito bahulīkṛtaḥ, sa tena hetunā tena pratyayenaitarhi rañjanīye vastuni tīvrarāgaś ca bhavaty āyatarāgaś ca /
T06srabhu_u:2865: yena pudgalena dveṣaḥ pūrvam anyāsu (Śbh II
T06srabhu_u:2866: 6) jātiṣv āsevito bhāvito bahulīkṛtaḥ, tena ca hetunā tena pratyayenaitarhi dveṣaṇīye vastuni tīvradveṣaś ca bhavaty āyatadveṣaś ca /
T06srabhu_u:2869: yena pudgalena pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu moha āsevito bhāvito bahulīkṛtaḥ, tena ca hetunā tena pratyayenaitarhi mohanīye
T06srabhu_u:2870: vastuni tīvramohaś ca bhavaty āyatamohaś ca /
T06srabhu_u:2873: yena pudgalena pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu māna āsevito bhāvito bahulīkṛtaḥ, tena ca hetunā tena ca pratyayenaitarhi
T06srabhu_u:2874: mananīye vastuni tīvramānaś ca bhavaty āyatamānaś ca /
T06srabhu_u:2877: yena pudgalena pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu vitarka āsevito bhāvito bahulīkṛtaḥ, tena ca hetunā tenaiva pratyayenaitarhi vitarkasthānīye vastuni tīvravitarkaś ca bhavaty āyatavitarkaś ca /
T06srabhu_u:2881: yena pudgalena pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu rāgo dveṣo moho māno vitarko nāsevito bhāvito bahulīkṛtaḥ
T06srabhu_u:2882: na caite dharmā ādīnavato dṛṣṭā vidūṣitāḥ saṃtīritāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:2883: sa tena hetunā tena pratyayena rañjanīye vā vastuni dveṣaṇīye mohanīye manyanīye vitarkanīye na tīvrarāgo bhavati nāpy āyatarāgaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:2884: na cāsya na samudācarati rāgo yaduta tena vastuna /
T06srabhu_u:2885: yathā rāga evaṃ dveṣo moho māno vitarkaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:2888: yena pudgalena pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu na rāga āsevito bhāvito bahulīkṛtaḥ /

T06srabhu_u:3063: atyarthaṃ ca pareṣāṃ viheṭhanajātīyo bhavati yaduta kāyena vācā /

T06srabhu_u:3229: (Śbh II 44) adhimucyate tad eva jñeyaṃ vastv adhimucyate /

T06srabhu_u:3288: yat tāvad t āha "savikalpaṃ pratibimbam" itīdam atra vipaśyanapakṣyasya /
T06srabhu_u:3289: yat punar āha "nirvikalpaṃ pratibimbam" itīdam atra śamathapakṣyasya /
T06srabhu_u:3295: "evam anuśrūyate", āyuṣmān revato bhagavantaṃ praśnam aprākṣīt /
T06srabhu_u:3296: "kiyati, bhadanta, bhikṣur yogī yogācāra ālambane cittam upanibadhnāti.
T06srabhu_u:3298: "kathaṃ punar ālambane cittam upanibaddhaṃ sūpanibaddhaṃ bhavati" //
T06srabhu_u:3301: "sādhu, sādhu, revata, sādhu khalu tvaṃ revata, etam arthaṃ pṛcchasi /
T06srabhu_u:3302: tena hi śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru, bhāṣiṣye /
T06srabhu_u:3304: revata, bhikṣur yogī yogācāraś caritaṃ vā viśodhayitukāmaḥ, kauśalyaṃ vā kartukāmaḥ, āsravebhyo vā cittaṃ vimocayitukāmaḥ, anurūpe cālambane cittam
T06srabhu_u:3305: upanibadhnāti, pratirūpe ca samyag eva copanibadhnāti, tatra cānirākṛtadhyāyī bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:3307: saced revata, bhikṣur yogī yogācāro rāgacarita eva sann aśubhālambane cittam upanibadhnāti
T06srabhu_u:3308: evam anurūpa ālambane cittam upanibadhnāti, dveṣacarito vā punar maitryām /
T06srabhu_u:3310: saced revata, sa bhikṣur yogī yogācāro vitarkacarita eva sann ānāpānasmṛtau (Śbh II 52) cittam upanibadhnāti /
T06srabhu_u:3312: sacet sa revata, bhikṣuḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ svalakṣaṇe saṃmūdha ātmasattvajīvajantupoṣapudgalavastusaṃmūḍhaḥ skandhakauśalye cittam upanibadhnāti /
T06srabhu_u:3316: kāmānām audārikatve rūpāṇāṃ śāntatve, rūpebhyo vā vairāgyaṃ kartukāmo rūpāṇām audārikatva ārūpyaśāntatāyāṃ ca cittam upanibadhnāti /
T06srabhu_u:3317: sarvatra vā satkāyān nirvettukāmaḥ, vimoktukāmaḥ, duḥkhasatye samudayasatye,
T06srabhu_u:3319: evaṃ hi, revata, bhikṣur yogī yogacāro 'nurūpa ālambane cittam upanibadhnāti //
T06srabhu_u:3320: kathaṃ ca revata, bhikṣur yogī yogācāraḥ pratirūpa ālambane cittam
T06srabhu_u:3322: iha revata, bhikṣur yad yad eva jñeyaṃ vastu vicetukāmo
T06srabhu_u:3323: bhavati, pravicetukāmaḥ parivitarkayitukāmaḥ parimīmāṃsayitukāmaḥ, tac ca tena pūrvam eva dṛṣṭaṃ vā bhavati, śrutaṃ vā mataṃ vā vijñātaṃ vā /
T06srabhu_u:3324: sa tad eva dṛṣṭam adhipatiṃ kṛtvā śrutaṃ mataṃ vijñātam adhipatiṃ kṛtvā samāhitabhūmikena manaskāreṇa manasikaroti /
