T06srabhu_u:3655: yadāśvāsaḥ praviṣṭo bhavati niruddhaś ca praśvāsa utpanno bhavati nirgataś ca, tadaikam iti gaṇayati /
T06srabhu_u:3658: āśvāsaṃ ca praśvāsaṃ cedaṃ dvayam ekadhyam abhisaṃkṣipyaikam iti gaṇayati, tenocyate dvayaikagaṇanā
T06srabhu_u:3660: anayaivaikaikagaṇanayā dvayaikagaṇanayā vānulomaṃ yāvad daśa gaṇayati /
T06srabhu_u:3665: pratilomaṃ daśa upādāya navāṣṭau sapta ṣaṭ pañca yāvad ekaṃ gaṇayati /
T06srabhu_u:3667: yadā sa ekaikagaṇanāṃ niśritya dvayaikagaṇanāṃ vā, anulomagaṇanāyāṃ,
T06srabhu_u:3668: pratilomagaṇanāyāṃ ca kṛtaparicayo bhavati, na cāsyāntarāc cittaṃ
T06srabhu_u:3669: vikṣipyate, avikṣiptacittaś ca gaṇayati, tadāsyottaragaṇanāviśeṣo vyapadiśyate //
T06srabhu_u:3671: ekaikagaṇanayā vā, dvayaikagaṇanayā vā, dvayam ekaṃ kṛtvā gaṇayati /
T06srabhu_u:3673: II 88) bhavati, ekaikagaṇanayā punar āśvāsaḥ praśvāsaś " caikaṃ bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:3675: evam uttarottaravṛddhyā yāvac chatam apy ekaṃ kṛtvā gaṇayati /
T06srabhu_u:3677: evam asya gaṇanāprayutkasya yāvad daśaikaṃ kṛtvā gaṇayati /
T06srabhu_u:3679: tayā daśaikagaṇanayā na cāsyāntarāc cittaṃ vikṣipyate /
T06srabhu_u:3681: tasya ca gaṇanāprayuktasya saced antarāc cittaṃ vikṣipyate, tadā punaḥ pratinivartyādito gaṇayitum ārabhate 'nulomaṃ vā, pratilomaṃ vā /
T06srabhu_u:3682: yadā cāsya gaṇanāparicayāt tac cittaṃ svarasenaiva vāhimārgasamārūḍham āśvāsapraśvāsālambanopanibaddham avyavacchinnaṃ nirantaraṃ, pravartamāna āśvāse pravṛttigrāhakam, niruddha āśvāse nivṛttigrāhakaṃ
T06srabhu_u:3683: praśvāsaśūnyāvasthāgrāhakaṃ, pravṛtte praśvāse pravṛttigrāhakaṃ, nivṛtte punar nivṛttigrāhakam āśvāsaśūnyāvasthāgrāhakam avikaṃpyam avicalam
T06srabhu_u:3688: āśvāsapraśvāsā anugantavyāś cābhilakṣayitavyāś ca sāntarāśvāsapraśvāsāḥ sapravṛttinivṛttyavasthāḥ
T06srabhu_u:3690: sa khalv eṣa gaṇanāparicayo mṛdvindriyāṇāṃ vyapadiśyate /
T06srabhu_u:3693: anyathā gaṇanām antareṇa teṣāṃ styānamiddhaṃ vā cittaṃ paryavanaheta, bahirdhā vā cittaṃ vikṣipyeta, gaṇanāprayuktānāṃ tu teṣām etan na bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:3694: ye tu tīkṣṇendriyāḥ paṭubuddhayas teṣāṃ punar gaṇanāprayogeṇa priyārohatā bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:3695: tatropadiṣṭā evaṃ gaṇanāprayogaṃ laghu laghv eva pratividhyanti,
T06srabhu_u:3697: te punar āśvāsapraśvāsālambanāṃ smṛtim upanibadhya yatra ca pravartante yāvac ca pravartante, yathā ca pravartante, yadā ca pravartante, tat sarvam anugacchaty upalakṣayaty upasthitayā smṛtyā /
T06srabhu_u:3699: tasya ca prayogasyāsevanānvayād bhāvanānvayād bahulīkārānvayāt kāyaprasrabdhir utpadyate, cittaprasrabdhiś ca /
T06srabhu_u:3700: ekāgratāṃ ca spṛśaty ālambanābhiratiṃ ca nirgacchati //
T06srabhu_u:3701: sa evaṃ kṛtaparicayo grāhyagrāhakavastumanasikāreṇa skandhān avatarati /
T06srabhu_u:3703: ye cāśvāsapraśvāsā yaś caiṣām āśrayakāyas taṃ manasikurvan rūpaskandham avatarati /
T06srabhu_u:3704: yā teṣām āśvāsapraśvāsānāṃ tadgrāhikayā smṛtyā saṃprayuktānubhāvanā sa vedanāskandha ity avatarati
T06srabhu_u:3705: yā saṃjānanā sa saṃjñāskandha ity avatarati /
T06srabhu_u:3706: yā cāsau smṛtir yā ca cetanā, yā ca tatra prajñā, ayaṃ saṃskāraskandha ity avatarati /
T06srabhu_u:3708: II 92) cittaṃ mano vijñānam ayaṃ vijñanaskandha ity avatarati /
T06srabhu_u:3709: yā tadbahulavihāritā evaṃ skandheṣv avatīrṇasyāyam ucyate skandhāvatāraparicayaḥ //
T06srabhu_u:3710: yadā cānena skandhamātraṃ dṛṣṭaṃ bhavati parijñātaṃ saṃskāramātraṃ vastumātraṃ tadā sa eṣām eva saṃskārāṇāṃ pratītyasamutpādam avatarati /
T06srabhu_u:3716: eta āśvāsapraśvāsāḥ kāyapratyayāś cittāśritāś cittapratyayāś ca" /
T06srabhu_u:3718: sa "kāyaś cittaṃ ca jīvitendriyapratyayam" ity avatarati /
T06srabhu_u:3732: sa tadbahulavihārī pratītyasamutpādāvatāre kṛtaparicaya ity ucyate /
T06srabhu_u:3734: sa evaṃ pratītyasamutpāde kṛtaparicayo "ya ete saṃskārāḥ pratītyasamutpannā anityā eta" ity avatarati /
T06srabhu_u:3739: ye jātijarāvyādhimaraṇadharmāṇas te duḥkhāḥ, ye duḥkhās te 'nātmānaḥ, asvatantrāḥ, svāmivirahitāḥ"
T06srabhu_u:3742: "yā kācid eṣāṃ saṃskārāṇām abhinirvṛttir duḥkhabhūtā rogabhūtā
T06srabhu_u:3744: yat punar asyā duḥkhajanikāyās tṛṣṇāyā aśeṣaprahāṇam etac chāntam etat praṇītam evaṃ ca me jānata evaṃ bahulavihāriṇas tṛṣṇāyā aśeṣaprahāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatī"ti /
T06srabhu_u:3745: evaṃ hi samudayasatyaṃ nirodhasatyaṃ mārgasatyam avatīrṇo bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:3748: tasyaivam satyeṣu kṛtaparicayasya darśanaprahātavyeṣu kleśeṣu prahīṇeṣu bhāvanāprahātavyā avaśiṣṭā bhavanti //
T06srabhu_u:3752: (Śbh II 96) tadyathā smṛta āśvasan "smṛta āśvasimī"ti śikṣate /
T06srabhu_u:3754: dīrgham hrasvaṃ sarvakāyapratisaṃvedy āśvasan "sarvakāyapratisaṃvedy āśvasimī"ti śikṣate /
T06srabhu_u:3756: prasrabhya kāyasaṃskārān āśvasan "prasrabhya kāyasaṃskārān āśvasimī"ti śikṣate /
T06srabhu_u:3765: abhipramodayaṃś cittaṃ samādadhaṃś crttaṃ vimocayaṃś cittam āśvasan
T06srabhu_u:3771: / nirodhānudarśī praśvasan nirodhānudarśī praśvasimīti (Śbh II 98) śikṣate
T06srabhu_u:3773: sa śaikṣo dṛṣṭapado lābhī bhavati caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānām /
T06srabhu_u:3778: yadāśvāsaṃ vā praśvāsaṃ vālambate tadā "dīrgham āśvasimi praśvasimī"ti
T06srabhu_u:3785: yadā sūkṣmasauṣiryagatān āśvāsapraśvāsān romakūpānupraviṣṭān kāye 'dhimucyate, ālambanīkaroti tadā sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:3786: yasmin vā punaḥ samaye niruddha āśvāse 'ntarāśvāse ca /
T06srabhu_u:3792: praśvāsāśvāsaśūnyāṃ tadvyapetāṃ tadvyavahitāṃ riktām avasthām ālambanīkaroti /
T06srabhu_u:3795: prasrabhya kāyasaṃskārān praśvasan, "prasrabhya kāyasaṃskārān praśvasimī"ti śikṣate /
T06srabhu_u:3796: api tu khalu tasyāsevanānvayād bhāvanānvayād bahulīkārānvayāt /
T06srabhu_u:3797: ye kharā duḥsaṃsparśā āśvāsapraśvāsāḥ pūrvam akṛtaparicayasya pravṛtta bhavanti /
T06srabhu_u:3798: kṛtaparicayasya anye ca mṛdavaḥ sukhasaṃsparśāḥ pravartante /
T06srabhu_u:3801: sa caivam ānāpānasmṛtiprayogeṇa ca yuktaḥ sacel lābhī bhavati prathamasya vā dhyānasya dvitīyasya vā tasmin samaye prītipratisaṃvedy āśvasan,
T06srabhu_u:3803: sacet punar lābhī bhavati niṣprītikasya tṛtīyasya dhyānasya sa tasmin samaye sukhapratisaṃvedī bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:3804: tṛtīyāc ca dhyānād ūrdhvam ānāpānasmṛtisaṃprayogo nāsti /
T06srabhu_u:3806: tasyaivaṃ prītipratisaṃvedino vā sukhapratisaṃvedino vā sacet kadācit karhacit smṛtisaṃpramoṣād utpadyate /
T06srabhu_u:3808: "bhaviṣyāmī"ti vā, "na bhaviṣyāmī"ti vā, "rūpī bhaviṣyāmy arūpī bhaviṣyāmi" (Śbh II 102)
T06srabhu_u:3812: sa tad utpannaṃ laghu laghv eva prajñayā pratividhyati nādhivāsayati prajahāti vinodayati vyantīkaroti /
T06srabhu_u:3815: sacet punar lābhī bhavati maulānāṃ prathamadvitīyatṛtīyānāṃ dhyānānāṃ sa cāvaśyam anāgamyasya prathamadhyānasāmantakasya lābhī bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:3816: sa taṃ niśrityotpannaṃ svaṃ cittaṃ pratyavekṣate /
T06srabhu_u:3817: sarāgaṃ vā vigatarāgaṃ vā sadveṣaṃ vā vigatadveṣaṃ vā samohaṃ vigatamohaṃ, saṃkṣiptaṃ vikṣiptaṃ līnaṃ pragṛhītam uddhatam anuddhataṃ vyupaśāntaṃ avyupaśāntaṃ samāhitam asamāhitaṃ subhāvitam asubhāvitaṃ vimuktaṃ cittam avimuktaṃ cittam iti
T06srabhu_u:3820: sa yadā styānamiddhanivaraṇena cittaṃ nivṛtaṃ bhavaty adhyātmam saṃśamayatas tadānyatamānyatamena prasadanīyenālambanena saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati /
T06srabhu_u:3823: yadā punar auddhatyanivaraṇena kaukṛtyanivaraṇena nivṛtaṃ paśyaty abhisaṃpragṛhṇatas tadānyatamānyatamena prasadanīyenālambanena saṃdarśayaty adhyātmam avasthāpayati śamayati samādhatte /
T06srabhu_u:3825: yadā ca tac cittam āsevanānvayād bhāvanānvayād bahulīkārānvayān nivaraṇasamudācārād dūrīkṛtaṃ bhavati nivaraṇebhyo viśodhitam /
T06srabhu_u:3826: tenāha vimocayaṃś cittam āśvasan "vimocayaṃś cittam āśvasimī"ti śikṣate /
T06srabhu_u:3830: yaduta saṃskārānityatām eva sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca yoniśaḥ pratyaveksate /
T06srabhu_u:3832: tena ca pūrvaṃ prathamadvitīyatṛtīyadhyānasanniśrayeṇānāgamyasaṃniśrayeṇa vā punaḥ śamathayogaḥ kṛtaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:3834: evam asya tac cittaṃ śamathavipaśyanāparibhāvitaṃ dhātuṣu vimucyate yadutānuśayebhyaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:3836: yaś ca prahāṇadhātur yaś ca virāgadhātur yaś ca nirodhadhātuḥ /
T06srabhu_u:3841: sa evaṃ trīn dhātuñ śāntato manasikurvan kṣemata ārogyataḥ śamathavipaśyanāṃ bhāvayati /
T06srabhu_u:3842: yenāsyāsevanānvayād bhāvanānvayād bahulīkārānvayād avaśiṣṭebhyo bhāvanāprahātavyebhyaḥ kleśebhyaś cittaṃ vimucyate /
T06srabhu_u:3846: evam ayaṃ darśanabhāvanāprahātavyeṣu kleśeṣu prahīṇeṣv arhan bhavati
T06srabhu_u:3850: yaś cāyaṃ pañcavidhaḥ paricaya iyam asyocyata ānāpānasmṛtiḥ /
T06srabhu_u:3851: yatra vitarkacaritaḥ pudgalaḥ prayujyamānaḥ priyārohatayā prayujyate /
T06srabhu_u:3852: savyāpāraṃ caitad ālambanaṃ savyākṣepam adhyātmaṃ pratyātmam āsannāsannaṃ,
T06srabhu_u:3853: yenāsya tatra prayujyamānasya yo vitarkasaṃkṣobhaḥ sa na bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:3854: tvaritatvaritaṃ ca cittam ālambane saṃtiṣṭhate, abhiramate /
T06srabhu_u:3855: idaṃ pañcamaṃ vitarkacaritasya pudgalasya caritaviśodhanam ālambanam //
T06srabhu_u:3858: tadyathā skandhakauśalyaṃ dhātukauśalyam āyatanakauśalyaṃ pratītyasamutpādakauśalyaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalyam
T06srabhu_u:3862: pañca skandhāḥ rūpaskandho vedanāskandhaḥ saṃjñāskandhaḥ saṃskāraskandho vijñānaskandhaś ca /
T06srabhu_u:3864: yat kiñcid rūpaṃ sarvaṃ tac catvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri mahābhūtāny upādāya /
T06srabhu_u:3865: tat punar atītānāgatapratyutpannam ādhyātmikaṃ vā bāhyaṃ vaudārikaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā dūre vāntike vā /
T06srabhu_u:3869: ṣaḍ vedanākāyāś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā /
T06srabhu_u:3872: parīttasaṃjñā, mahadgatasaṃjñā, apramāṇasaṃjñā, nāsti kiñcid ity
T06srabhu_u:3874: ṣaṭ saṃjñākāyāś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā saṃjñā śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaḥsaṃsparśajā saṃjñā /
T06srabhu_u:3878: vedanāṃ ca saṃjñāṃ ca sthāpayitvā ye tadanye caitasikā dharmāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:3883: sā caiṣā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskāras tac caitad vijñānam atītānāgatapratyutpannam ādhyātmikaṃ vā bāhyaṃ veti vistareṇa pūrvavat /
T06srabhu_u:3887: II 110) ca jānāti bahvātmakatayā ca, na ca tataḥ param upalabhate vikalpayati vā /
T06srabhu_u:3898: kiṃ ca na tasmāt param upalabhate vikalpayati /
T06srabhu_u:3900: no tu skandhavyatirekeṇātmānam upalabhate nityadhruvam avipariṇāmadharmakam /
T06srabhu_u:3901: nāpy ātmīyaṃ, kiṃcid idaṃ nopalabhate, na vikalpayati tasmāt pareṇa //
T06srabhu_u:3906: cakṣurdhātū rūpadhātuś cakṣurvijñānadhātuḥ śrotradhātuḥ śabdadhātuḥ śrotravijñānadhātur ghrāṇadhātur gandhadhātur ghrāṇavijñānadhātur jihvādhātū rasadhātur jihvāvijñānadhātuḥ kāyadhātuḥ spraṣṭavyadhātuḥ kāyavijñānadhātur manodhātur dharmadhātur manovijñānadhātuḥ /
T06srabhu_u:3909: yat punar etān aṣṭādaśa dharmān svakāt svakād dhātoḥ svakasvakād bījāt svakasvakād gotrāj jāyante nirvartante prādurbhavantīti jānāti rocayann upanidhyāti /
T06srabhu_u:3911: / yad aṣṭādaśānāṃ dharmāṇām svakasvakād dhātoḥ pravṛttiṃ jānāti tad evam
T06srabhu_u:3922: tatra cakṣur adhipatī rūpāṇy ālambanaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya sasaṃprayogasyotpattaye, samanantaraniruddhaṃ ca manaḥ
T06srabhu_u:3924: tatra śrotram adhipatiḥ śabda ālambanaṃ samanantaraniruddhaṃ ca manaḥ samanantarapratyayaḥ śrotravijñānasya sasaṃprayogasyotpattaye /
T06srabhu_u:3925: evaṃ yāvan manaḥsamanantaraṃ tajjo manaskāro 'dhipatipratyayo dharma ālambanaṃ manovijñānasya
T06srabhu_u:3926: iti tribhiḥ pratyayaiḥ samanantarapratyayena ālambanapratyayena adhipatipratyayena ca ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānakāyānāṃ pravṛttir bhavati sasaṃprayogāṇām iti /
T06srabhu_u:3931: / avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ, saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānam, vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpam /
T06srabhu_u:3933: evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:3935: yat punar dharmā eva dharmān abhispandayanti dharmā eva dharmān parispandayanti /
T06srabhu_u:3936: saṃskārā eva dharmāṇām āhārakāḥ, te ca hetusamutpannatvāt (Śbh II 114) pratītyasamutpannatvād abhūtvā bhavanti
T06srabhu_u:3939: ye punar anityās te jātidharmāṇo jarādharmāṇo vyādhidharmāṇo maraṇadharmāṇaḥ śokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsadharmāṇaḥ
T06srabhu_u:3941: ye vā punar duḥkhā, asvatantrā, durbalās ta anātmāna iti /
T06srabhu_u:3942: yad ebhir ākāraiḥ pratītyasamutpanneṣu dharmeṣv anityajñānam, duḥkhajñānam, nairātmyajñānam
T06srabhu_u:3950: yad evaṃ jñānam idam ucyate sthānāsthānakauśalyam /
T06srabhu_u:3951: tac caitat pañcasthānakauśalyaṃ samāsataḥ svalakṣaṇakauśalyaṃ bhavati sāmānyalakṣaṇakauśalyaṃ ca /
T06srabhu_u:3952: tatra skandhakauśalyena svalakṣaṇakauśalyam ākhyātam avaśiṣṭaiḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇakauśalyam /
T06srabhu_u:3957: tadyathā kāmadhātau prathamadhyānasya evaṃ yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasya /
T06srabhu_u:3961: tatra svabhāvaudārikatā kāmadhātāv api pañcaskandhāḥ saṃvidyante prathame tu dhyāne /
T06srabhu_u:3962: ye kāmāvacarās te sādīnavatarāś ca duḥkhavihāratarāś ca, (Śbh
T06srabhu_u:3963: II 116) alpakāvasthāyitarāś ca, hīnatarāḥ pratikruṣṭatarāś ca /
T06srabhu_u:3965: prathame tu dhyāne na tathā tena te śāntatarāḥ praṇītatarā ity ucyante /
T06srabhu_u:3967: kāmāvacaro rūpaskandhaḥ prabhūtataraḥ parijñeyaḥ prahātavya evaṃ yāvad vijñānaskandhaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:3969: evam uparimāsu bhūmiṣu svabhāvaudārikatā saṃkhyaudārikatā ca yathāyogaṃ veditavyāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:3970: iyaṃ tūparimāsu bhūmiṣu yāvad ākiṃcanyāyatanāt tadaudārikatā veditavyāḥ,
T06srabhu_u:3971: sarvā adharimā bhūmayo duḥkhavihāratarāś ca alpāyuṣkatarāś ca /
T06srabhu_u:3972: naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ punaḥ śāntam eva, upari śreṣṭhatarāyā bhūmer
T06srabhu_u:3975: yasyāṃ yasyāṃ bhūmau prabhūtataram ādīnavaṃ bhavati, sā ādīnavata audārikety ucyate /
T06srabhu_u:3976: yasyāṃ tu yasyāṃ bhūmāv alpataram ādīnavaṃ bhavati, sā ādīnavataḥ śāntety
T06srabhu_u:3978: idaṃ laukikānāṃ laukikena mārgeṇa kleśaviśodhanam ālambanam,
T06srabhu_u:3982: ya adhobhūmikāḥ kleśā yāvad ākiṃcanyāyatanabhūmikāḥ kāmadhātum upādāya te prahīyante /
T06srabhu_u:3984: te punar eva te pratisaṃdhikā bhavanti //
T06srabhu_u:3986: lokottareṇa vā punar mārgeṇa kleśaviśodhanam ālambanaṃ caturvidhaṃ tadyathā duḥkhasatyaṃ samudayasatyaṃ nirodhasatyaṃ mārgasatyaṃ ca /
T06srabhu_u:3988: tadyathā jātir duḥkhaṃ jarā duḥkhaṃ vyādhir maraṇam apriyasaṃprayogaḥ priyavinābhāva icchāvighātaś ca /
T06srabhu_u:3990: tatra samudaya āryasatyaṃ tṛṣṇā paunarbhavikī nandīrāgasahagatā tatratatrābhinandinī /
T06srabhu_u:3991: tatra nirodha āryasatyaṃ yad asyā eva tṛṣṇāyā aśeṣaprahāṇam /
T06srabhu_u:3993: tatra kṛṣṇapakṣaṃ śuklapakṣaṃ copādāya hetuphalavyavasthānena catuḥsatyavyavasthānam /
T06srabhu_u:3998: tatra duḥkhasatyaṃ vyādhisthānīyaṃ tat prathamataḥ parijñeyam /
T06srabhu_u:4000: nirodhasatyam ārogyasthānīyaṃ tac ca sparśayitavyaṃ sākṣātkartavyam /
T06srabhu_u:4001: mārgasatyaṃ bhaiṣajyasthānīyaṃ tac cāsevitavyaṃ bhāvayitavyaṃ bahulīkartavyam //
T06srabhu_u:4003: bhūtaṃ caitat tathā avitathā aviparītam aviparyastaṃ duḥkhaṃ duḥkhārthena,
T06srabhu_u:4004: yāvan mārgo mārgārthena tasmāt satyam ity ucyate /
T06srabhu_u:4009: kasmāt punar etāny āryāṇām eva satyāni bhavanti /
T06srabhu_u:4010: āryā etāni satyāny eva samānāni satyato jānanti paśyanti yathābhūtam /
T06srabhu_u:4011: bālās tu na jānanti, na paśyanti yathābhūtam /
T06srabhu_u:4015: tatra jātiduḥkham iti jāyamānasya duḥkhā vedanotpadyate kāyikacaitasikī,
T06srabhu_u:4016: na tu jātir eva duḥkhaṃ duḥkhanidānam sā evaṃ yāvad icchāvighāto duḥkham iti, icchāvighātanidānaṃ duḥkham utpadyate kāyikacaitasikam, na tv icchāvighāta eva duḥkhaṃ duḥkhanidānaṃ punaḥ sa iti peyālam /
T06srabhu_u:4017: saṃkṣepataḥ pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkham ity ebhir jātyādibhiḥ paryāyair duḥkhaduḥkhataiva paridīpitā
T06srabhu_u:4018: tatra vipariṇāmaduḥkhatā saṃskāraduḥkhatā cāvaśiṣṭā sā punaḥ pañcopādānaskandhaduḥkhatayā paridīpitā bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:4019: tathā hi pañcopādānaskandhās trivedanāparigatās te tathoktāyā duḥkhaduḥkhatāyā bhājanabhūtāḥ
T06srabhu_u:4020: yā ca noktā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatā saṃskāraduḥkhatā ca sāpy eṣv eva draṣṭavyā /
T06srabhu_u:4021: kena punaḥ kāraṇena bhagavatā duḥkhaduḥkhataiva parikīrtitā svaśabdena,
T06srabhu_u:4023: tathā hi duḥkhaduḥkhatāyām āryāṇāṃ bālānāṃ ca tulyā duḥkhatābuddhiḥ pravartate /
T06srabhu_u:4024: saṃvejikā atyarthaṃ duḥkhaduḥkhatā pūrvam akṛtaprajñānām evaṃ ca deśyamāne sukham avatāro bhavati satyeṣu vineyānām //
T06srabhu_u:4026: tatra trividhāyā duḥkhatāyāḥ kathaṃ vyavasthānaṃ bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:4027: yat tāvad duḥkhaṃ jātir duḥkhaṃ yāvad icchāvighāto duḥkham ity anena sādhiṣṭhānā duḥkhā vedanā ākhyātā sā ca duḥkhaduḥkhatā /
T06srabhu_u:4029: ye ye vā punar etad vipakṣā dharmās tathā yauvanaṃ jarāyāḥ, vyādher
T06srabhu_u:4032: ye ca duḥkhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ pravṛttāḥ kleśāḥ sādhiṣṭhānāḥ, ye cārogyādiṣu sukhasthānīyeṣu dharmeṣu tannirjātāyāṃ ca vedanāyāṃ ye pravṛttāḥ kleśāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:4034: tatra sukhā vedanā sādhiṣṭhānā, anityatayā pariṇamantī anyathībhāvādhipateyaṃ duḥkhaṃ vidadhāti
T06srabhu_u:4035: kleśāḥ punaḥ sarvatra pravṛttāḥ paryavasthānata eva duḥkhā bhavanti /
T06srabhu_u:4036: vipariṇāmaś ca sa cetasas tasmād vipariṇāmaduḥkhatety ucyate /
T06srabhu_u:4039: yathā coktaṃ "kāmacchandaparyavasthitaḥ kāmacchandaparyavasthānapratyayaṃ tajjaṃ caitasikaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayate" /
T06srabhu_u:4040: evaṃ vyāpādastyānamiddhauddhatyakaukṛtyavicikitsāparyavasthitas tad anenāgamenāptena paramāptena kleśeṣu duḥkhārtho 'pi labhyate vipariṇāmārtho 'pi /
T06srabhu_u:4044: duḥkhaduḥkhatā, yā ca kleśasaṃgṛhītā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatā, yā ca (Śbh II
T06srabhu_u:4045: 124) sādhiṣṭhānasukhavedanāsaṃgṛhitā tāṃ sthāpayitvā ye tadanye skandhā
T06srabhu_u:4046: aduḥkhāsukhasahagatās tannirjātās tadutpattipratyayās tasya cotpannasya sthitibhājanāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:4048: ye skandhā anityā udayavyayayuktāḥ sopādānās trivedanābhir anuṣaktā dauṣṭhulyopagatā ayogakṣemapatitā avinirmuktā duḥkhaduḥkhatāyā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatāyā asvavaśavartinaś ca /
T06srabhu_u:4052: sā punaḥ prārthanā tribhir mukhaiḥ pravṛttā tadyathā punarbhavaprārthanā, viṣayaprārthanā ca /
T06srabhu_u:4053: tatra yā punarbhavaprārthanā sā paunarbhavikī tṛṣṇā /
T06srabhu_u:4055: prāpteṣu viṣayeṣu saumanasyādhyavasānasahagatā, aprāpteṣu ca viṣayeṣu saṃyogābhilāṣasahagatā
T06srabhu_u:4056: tatra yā prāpteṣu viṣayeṣu saumanasyādhyavasānasahagatā nandīrāgasahagatety ucyate /
T06srabhu_u:4057: yā punar aprāpteṣu viṣayeṣu saṃyogābhilāṣasahagatā tatratatrābhinandinīty ucyate /
T06srabhu_u:4062: idam ālambanaṃ kleśaviśodhanaṃ lokottareṇa mārgeṇa veditavyam //
T06srabhu_u:4071: yad aviparītaṃ dharmam arthaṃ ca deśayati grāhayati bhūtaṃ yad asya niryāti samyagduḥkhakṣayāya
T06srabhu_u:4075: uttānottānāni sthānāni tatprathamato grāhayati vācayati, tataḥ paścād gambhīrāṇi,
T06srabhu_u:4076: prathamasya vā satyasyābhisamayāya tatprathamato 'vavadate, tataḥ paścāt samudayanirodhamārgasatyasya, prathamasya dhyānasya samāpattaye
T06srabhu_u:4080: tatrāgamāvavādo yathā tena gurūṇām antikād āgamitaṃ bhavati, gurusthānīyānāṃ yogajñānām ācāryāṇām
T06srabhu_u:4081: upādhyāyasya vā, tathāgatasya vā, tathāgataśrāvakasya vā tathaivānenānyūnamadhikaṃ kṛtvā parān avavadate /
T06srabhu_u:4083: tatrādhigamāvavādo yathānena te dharmā adhigatā bhavanti /
T06srabhu_u:4094: ṛddhiprātihāryeṇa, anekavidhaṃ ṛddhiviṣayam upadarśayaty ātmani ca bahumānaṃ janayati pareṣām
T06srabhu_u:4097: tatra deśanāprātihāryeṇa cittacaritaā samanveṣya anuśāstiprātihāryeṇa yathendriyam, yathācaritam,
T06srabhu_u:4107: tatrādhicittaṃśikṣā viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ ca prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ yāvac caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati /
T06srabhu_u:4109: api khalu sarva ārūpyās tadanyāś ca samādhisamāpattayo 'dhicittaṃśikṣety ucyate /
T06srabhu_u:4110: api tu dhyānāni niśritya tatprathamataḥ satyābhisamayo nyāmāvakrāntir bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:4111: na tu sarveṇa sarvaṃ vinā dhyānais tasmāt pradhānāni dhyānāni kṛtvādhicittaṃśikṣety uktāni
T06srabhu_u:4112: tatrādhiprajñaṃśikṣā yac caturṣv āryasatyeṣu yathābhūtaṃ jñānaṃ //
T06srabhu_u:4113: kena kāraṇena tisra eva śikṣā na tata ūrdhvam /
T06srabhu_u:4117: tathā hi śīlaṃ pratiṣṭhāya cittaikāgratāṃ spṛśati cittasamādhim /
T06srabhu_u:4119: tathā hi samāhitacittasyaikāgratāsmṛtyā jñeye vastuni yathābhūtaṃ jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate
T06srabhu_u:4121: tathā hi suviśuddhena jñānadarśanena kleśaprahāṇam sākṣātkaroti /
T06srabhu_u:4122: eṣa hi svārtha etat paramaṃ kṛtyaṃ (Śbh II 132) yaduta kleśaprahāṇaṃ tata uttarikaraṇīyaṃ punar nāsti
T06srabhu_u:4126: avipratisāriṇaḥ prāmodyaṃ prītiḥ prasrabdhiḥ sukham, sukhitasya cittasamādhiḥ samāhitacitto yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti yathābhūtaṃ paśyati /
T06srabhu_u:4127: yathābhūtaṃ jānan paśyan nirvidyate nirviṇṇo virajyate /
T06srabhu_u:4130: evam imāni śīlāni bhāvitāny agratāyām upanayanti /
T06srabhu_u:4133: tatra kena kāraṇenādhiśīlaṃ śikṣā adhiśīlam ity ucyate, evam adhicittam adhiprajñam /
T06srabhu_u:4136: adhicittam adhikṛtya yac chīlaṃ sā adhiśīlaṃ śikṣā /
T06srabhu_u:4137: adhiprajñam adhikṛtya yaś cittasamādhiḥ, sā adhicittaṃśikṣā /
T06srabhu_u:4138: kleśaprahāṇam adhikṛtya yaj jñānaṃ darśanam, sā adhiprajñaṃśikṣā /
T06srabhu_u:4141: yā cādhiśīlaṃśikṣā yā cādhicittaṃ yā cādhiprajñaṃśikṣā etāḥ śikṣā asminn eva śāsane, asādhāraṇā ito bāhyaiḥ /
T06srabhu_u:4143: asti punar adhicittaṃśikṣā yā adhiprajñaṃśikṣāyā āvāhikā, asty adhiprajñaṃśikṣā yā adhicittaṃśikṣāyā āvāhikā /
T06srabhu_u:4144: tadyathā āryaśrāvako 'lābhī maulānāṃ dhyānānām, śaikṣo dṛṣṭapadaḥ, tataḥ paścād bhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ (Śbh II 134) kleśānāṃ prahāṇāya prayujyamānaḥ
T06srabhu_u:4147: adhicittaṃ punaḥ śikṣāṃ adhiprajñāyā āvāhikā pūrvam evoktā /
T06srabhu_u:4150: na tv asty adhiprajñaṃśikṣā yā vinādhiśīlenādhicittena ca /
T06srabhu_u:4151: ato yatrādhiprajñaṃśikṣā tatra tisraḥ śikṣā veditavyāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:4152: idaṃ tāvac chikṣāvyavasthānaṃ tatra yoginā yogaprayuktena śikṣitavyam //
T06srabhu_u:4157: tatra sarveṇa sarvam avītarāgaḥ satyāny abhisamāgacchan sahasatyābhisamayāt srota-āpanno
T06srabhu_u:4159: yadbhūyo vītarāgaḥ punaḥ satyāny abhisamāgacchan sahasatyābhisamayāt sakṛdāgāmī bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:4160: vītarāgaḥ satyāny abhisamāgacchan sahasatyābhisamayād anāgāmī bhavati //
T06srabhu_u:4170: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ kathaṃ vyavasthānaṃ bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:4173: tatra saṃskṛtaṃ traidhātukapratisaṃyuktāḥ pañca skandhāḥ, asaṃskṛtaṃ punar nirvāṇam /
T06srabhu_u:4174: idam ubhayaṃ yac ca saṃskṛtam, yac cāsaṃskṛtam ity ucyate sat /
T06srabhu_u:4175: yat punar idam ucyata ātmā vā, sattvo vā, jīvo vā, jantur vā, idam asat /
T06srabhu_u:4176: tatra saṃskṛte doṣadarśanād ādīnavadarśanād apraṇidhānaṃ bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:4178: nirvāṇe punas tatra praṇidhānavataḥ praṇidhānaṃ bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:4179: śāntadarśanaṃ praṇītadarśanaṃ niḥsaraṇadarśanaṃ ca, niḥsaraṇadarśanāc ca punar ānimittaṃ vimokṣamukhaṃ vyavasthāpyate /
T06srabhu_u:4180: tatrāsaty asaṃvidyamāne naiva praṇidhānaṃ nāpraṇidhānaṃ bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:4181: tad yathaivāsat tathaivāsad iti jānataḥ paśyataḥ śūnyatāvimokṣamukhaṃ vyavasthāpyate /
T06srabhu_u:4189: tadyathā mātṛgrāmaḥ śiśur udāravarṇo rañjanīyaḥ śikṣāprayuktasya kulaputrasyādhimātram antarāyakaraḥ paripanthakaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:4193: satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ kavaḍaṃkārāhāram upādāya rasarāgo lokākhyānakathāsv anekavidhāsu bahunānāprakārāsu citrāsu chandarāgānunayaḥ, dharmacintāyogamanasikārāpakṣālaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:4195: tadyathā kāṅkṣā vimatir vicikitsā ratneṣu vā satyeṣu vā skandheṣu vā karmaphale vā prahāṇaprayuktasya ca kāyadauṣṭhulyaḥ śaithilikasya śamathavipaśyanāpakṣālamanasikāraḥ styānamiddhena vā cittābhibhavaś cittābhisaṃkṣepaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:4198: / lābhena vā yaśasā vā praśaṃsayā vā anyatamānyatamena vā sukhalavamātratvena nandīsaumanasyam auddhatyam avyupaśama audbilyam utplāvitatvam /
T06srabhu_u:4201: bhāṣyaprayogaḥ, atyabhijalpaḥ, dharmyām api kathāṃ kathayatā vigṛhyakathām ārambhānuyogaḥ
T06srabhu_u:4202: pūrvadṛṣṭaśrutānubhūteṣu viṣayeṣv anekavidheṣu bahunānāprakāreṣu cittavisāraś cittākṣepaḥ
T06srabhu_u:4207: spṛṣṭasya śārīrikābhir vedanābhir duḥkhābhir yāvat prāṇahāriṇībhir jīvitaniyantir jīvitāśā, tadāśānugatasya śocanā,
T06srabhu_u:4210: katame daśa śikṣāpadānāṃ vilomānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pratipakṣeṇa śikṣānulomikā bhavanti /
T06srabhu_u:4222: itīmā daśa saṃjñā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā daśavidhasya śikṣāparipanthakasya daśānāṃ śikṣāvilomānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya saṃvartante /
T06srabhu_u:4223: tatra dharmālokaḥ, arthālokaḥ, śamathālokaḥ, vipaśyanālokaś ca /
T06srabhu_u:4225: asminn artha abhipretā dharmacintāyogamanasikārāḥ paripanthasya prahāṇāya //
T06srabhu_u:4241: tatrānulomika upadeśo ya upadeśo 'viparītaś cānupūrvikaś ca /
T06srabhu_u:4242: tatra yoniśaḥ prayogo yathaivāvavāditas tathaiva prayujyate /
T06srabhu_u:4244: tatra sātatyasatkṛtyakāritā yadrūpeṇa prayogeṇa avandhyaṃ ca kālaṃ karoti kuśalapakṣeṇa /
T06srabhu_u:4246: tatra tīvracchandatā yathāpi tad uttare vimokṣaspṛhām utpādayati /
T06srabhu_u:4247: "kadāsvid ahaṃ tad āyatanam upasaṃpadya vihariṣyāmi yad āryā āyatanam upasaṃpadya viharantī"ti
T06srabhu_u:4248: tatra yogabalādhānatā dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ yogabalādhānaprāpto bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:4250: tatra kāyacittadauṣṭhulyapratiprasrabdhir yathāpi tac chrāntakāyasya klāntakāyasyotpadyate kāyadauṣṭhulyaṃ cittadauṣṭhulyam /
T06srabhu_u:4252: ativitarkitenātivicāritenotpadyate kāyacittadauṣṭhulyam, tadādhyātmaṃ cetaḥ śamathānuyogena pratiprasrambhayati /
T06srabhu_u:4254: tad adhiprajñaṃ dharmavipaśyanayā, prasadanīyena ca manaskāreṇa prasrambhayati /
T06srabhu_u:4255: prakṛtyaiva cāprahīṇakleśasya kleśapakṣaṃ kāyacittadauṣṭhulyam avigataṃ bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:4258: tatrābhīkṣṇapratyavekṣā abhīkṣṇaṃ śīlāny ārabhya kukṛtaṃ pratyavekṣate sukṛtaṃ ca /
T06srabhu_u:4264: tathā kleśānāṃ prahīṇāprahīṇānāṃ mīmāṃsāmanaskāram adhipatiṃ kṛtvā abhīkṣṇaṃ pratyavekṣate
T06srabhu_u:4265: tatra prahīṇatāṃ jñātvā [yid bde bar 'gyur la /
T06srabhu_u:4266: ma spaṅs bar śes na] punaḥ punas tam eva mārgaṃ bhāvayati /
T06srabhu_u:4268: yat kālāntareṇa jñātavyaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ prāptavyaṃ tad ajānato 'paśyato 'nadhigacchataḥ paritamanā utpadyate, caitasikaḥ klamaḥ,
T06srabhu_u:4273: aviparītagrāhī, prāpte prāptasaṃjñī, adhigate 'dhigatasaṃjñī sākṣātkṛte sākṣatkṛtasaṃjñī /
T06srabhu_u:4274: itīme daśa dharmāḥ śikṣākāmasya yogina ādimadhyaparyavasānam upādāya śikṣām anulomayanti, na vilomayanti /
T06srabhu_u:4286: te hy aparinirvāṇadharmakatvād atyantaparibhraṣṭā eva yogād bhavanti /
T06srabhu_u:4289: pratyayavikalānām, te hi dūram api param api gatvā avaśyam eva pratyayān āsādayiṣyanti /
T06srabhu_u:4291: tenaiṣa teṣāṃ tāvatkālika eva yogabhraṃśo bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:4296: prayujyamāno nārādhako bhavati yogasya, nārādhayati nyāyyaṃ dharmaṃ
T06srabhu_u:4298: yathāpīhaikatyo bahukleśo bhavati, prabhūtarajaskajātīyaḥ paṭuvijñānaś ca bhavati paṭubuddhiḥ sahajayā buddhyā samanvāgataḥ sa
T06srabhu_u:4299: śrutam udgṛhṇāti śrutaṃ paryavāpnoty alpaṃ vā, prabhūtaṃ vā /
T06srabhu_u:4300: araṇye vā punar viharati, āgatāgatānāṃ ca gṛhipravrajitānām, ṛjukānām,
T06srabhu_u:4303: tasya tena hetubhāvena tena pratyayenotpadyate lābhasatkāraślokaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:4304: sa jñāto bhavati mahāpuṇyo lābhī bhavati
T06srabhu_u:4305: cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇām, satkṛtaś ca bhavati, gurukṛtaḥ, rājñāṃ rājamātrāṇām, yāvat sārthavāhānām,
T06srabhu_u:4310: "santi me śrāvakāḥ, gṛhipravrajitā ye, mayi saṃbhāvanā jātā yeṣām arhatsaṃmatas te cen mām upasaṃkramya yoge manasikāre
T06srabhu_u:4312: teṣāṃ cāhaṃ pṛṣṭo vyākuryāṃ na jānāmīty evaṃ sati yā saṃbhāvanā sā ca hīyet, na ca syām arhatsaṃmataḥ,
T06srabhu_u:4313: yan nv ahaṃ svayam eva cintayitvā tulayitvopaparīkṣya yogaṃ vyavasthāpayeyam" /
T06srabhu_u:4314: sa etam evārtham adhipatiṃ kṛtvā lābhasatkārābhigṛddha ekākī rahogataḥ svayam eva cintayitvā tulayitvopaparīkṣya yogaṃ vyavasthāpayati /
T06srabhu_u:4315: sa cāsya yogo na sūtre 'vatarati na vinaye saṃdṛśyate /
T06srabhu_u:4317: sa ye te bhikṣavaḥ sūtradharā, vinayadharā, mātṛkādharās teṣaṃ tad yogasthānaṃ vinigūhati na prakāśayati /
T06srabhu_u:4319: II 150) bhavanti gṛhiṇaḥ, pravrajitāś ca, tān api yogapratiguptaya
T06srabhu_u:4322: "mā haiva te sūtradharā, vinayadharā, mātṛkādharā, etad yogasthānaṃ śrutvā sūtre 'vatārayeyuḥ, tac ca nāvataret /
T06srabhu_u:4325: dharmatayā upaparīkṣeyuḥ, tac ca dharmatāṃ virodhayet /
T06srabhu_u:4326: te ca tato nidānam apratītā bhaveyur apratītavacanaiś ca māṃ codayeyuḥ /
T06srabhu_u:4328: "evam ahaṃ punar api na satkṛtaḥ syāṃ na gurukṛtaḥ, rājñāṃ rājāmātrāṇāṃ yāvad dhanināṃ śreṣṭhināṃ sārthavāhānām, na ca punar lābhī syāṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇām" iti /
T06srabhu_u:4329: sa tām eva lābhasatkārakāmatām adhipatiṃ kṛtvā adharme dharmasaṃjñī,
T06srabhu_u:4330: vinidhāya saṃjñāṃ rucim adharmaṃ dharmato dīpayati saṃprakāśayati /
T06srabhu_u:4331: tatra ye 'sya dṛṣṭyanumatam āpadyante te 'py adharme dharmasaṃjñino bhavanti mandatvān momuhatvāt te 'dharme dharmasaṃjñino yathānuśiṣṭā api
T06srabhu_u:4333: ayam evaṃrūpo mithyāpratipattikṛto yogabhraṃśaḥ saddharmapratirūpako hy asaddharmaḥ saddharmasyāntardhānāya
T06srabhu_u:4334: itīme catvāro yogabhraṃśā dhyāyinā bhikṣuṇā yogācāreṇa parijñeyā varjayitavyāḥ //
T06srabhu_u:4339: tadyathā śraddhā chando vīryam upāyaś ca //
T06srabhu_u:4340: tatra śraddhā dvyākārā dvividhādhiṣṭhānā, abhisaṃpratyayākārā prasādākārā ca, dharmayuktivicāraṇādhiṣṭhānā pudgalānubhāvādhimuktyadhiṣṭhānā ca //
T06srabhu_u:4342: tadyathā prāptaye yathāpīhaikatya uttare vimokṣaspṛhām utpādayati, vistareṇa pūrvavat /
T06srabhu_u:4343: paripṛcchāyai yathāpīhaikatyaḥ spṛhām utpādayaty ārāmaṃ gamanāya, vijñānāṃ sabrahmacāriṇāṃ yogajñānām antikam aśrutasya śravaṇāya, śrutasya ca paryavadānāya /
T06srabhu_u:4348: anuyogāya cchando yathāpīhaikatyaḥ sātatyaprayogatāyāṃ satkṛtyaprayogatāyāṃ ca mārgabhāvanāyāṃ spṛhām utpādayaty abhilāṣaṃ kartukāmatām /
T06srabhu_u:4350: yaduta prāptaye paripṛcchanāyai saṃbhārasamudāgamāya anuyogāya ca //
T06srabhu_u:4352: tatra vīryam api caturvidhaṃ tadyathā śravaṇāya, cintanāyai, bhāvanāyai,
T06srabhu_u:4355: yad aśrutaṃ ca śṛṇvataḥ, paryavadāpayataḥ, cetaso
T06srabhu_u:4359: evaṃ pratisaṃlayanapraviṣṭasya kālena kālaṃ śamathavipaśyanāṃ bhāvayataḥ /
T06srabhu_u:4360: evam ahorātrānuyuktasya caṃkramaniṣadyābhyāṃ nivaraṇebhyaś cittaṃ viśodhayataḥ,
T06srabhu_u:4363: tadyathā śīlasaṃvaram indriyasaṃvaram adhipatiṃ kṛtvā sūpasthitasmṛtitā tathā copasthitasmṛter apramādaś cetasa ārakṣā /
T06srabhu_u:4374: tac ca vīryam upāyaparigṛhītam aprāptasya prāptaye, anadhigatasyādhigamāya asākṣātkṛtasya sākṣātkriyāyai saṃvartate /
T06srabhu_u:4375: tasmād ime catvāro dharmā yoga ity ucyate41 //
T06srabhu_u:4380: tadyathā balavāhanaḥ, sacchidravāhanaḥ, niśchidravāhanaḥ, anābhogavāhanaś ca //
T06srabhu_u:4382: tadyathā ādikarmikasyādhyātmam eva cittaṃ sthāpayataḥ saṃsthāpayataś ca dharmān pravicinvataḥ, yāvan manaskāraṃ na prāpnoti, tāvad asya balavāhano manaskāro bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:4383: balād avaṣṭabhya tac cittam ekāgratāyām avasthāpayati /
T06srabhu_u:4387: yo labdhamanaskārasyordhvaṃ laukikena mārgeṇa gacchato lokottareṇa vā yo lakṣaṇapratisaṃvedī manaskāraḥ /
T06srabhu_u:4388: tathā hi samādhis tatra cintayā vyavakīryate, naikāntena bhāvanākāreṇa pravartate //
T06srabhu_u:4390: lakṣaṇapratisaṃvedino manaskārād ūrdhvaṃ yāvat prayoganiṣṭhān manasikārāt //
T06srabhu_u:4403: yena līnaṃ cittaṃ pragrāhakair nimittair abhipramodayati saṃpraharṣayati pragṛhṇāti /
T06srabhu_u:4405: tadyathā mīmāṃsāmanaskāraḥ, yam adhipatiṃ kṛtvā prahīṇāprahīṇatāṃ kleśānāṃ pratyavekṣate //
T06srabhu_u:4407: tatrālambanaṃ manasikurvatā kati nimittāni manasikartavyāni bhavanti /
T06srabhu_u:4410: tadyathālambananimittaṃ nidānanimittaṃ parivarjanīyaṃ nimittaṃ niṣevaṇīyaṃ ca nimittam //
T06srabhu_u:4417: vāmanuṣyakṛto vā śabdakṛto vā vyāyāmakṛto vā /
T06srabhu_u:4418: tathā vipaśyanāpūrvaṃgamo 'dhyātmaṃ cittābhisaṃkṣepa uttaptatarāyā vipaśyanāyā uttaratra nidānanimittam /
T06srabhu_u:4419: tathā śamathapūrvaṃgamā vipaśyanā uttaptatarasya śamathasyottaratra nidānanimittam //
T06srabhu_u:4421: tadyathā layanimittam auddhatyanimittaṃ saṅganimittaṃ vikṣepanimittaṃ ca /
T06srabhu_u:4427: yenālambananimittena nidānanimittena cittam ālambane rajyate saṃrajyate saṃkliśyate /
T06srabhu_u:4430: tāni punar nimittāni yathā samāhitāyāṃ bhūmau //
T06srabhu_u:4431: ebhir manaskārair ālambanam adhimucyataḥ katy adhimokṣā bhavanti /
T06srabhu_u:4434: tadyathā prabhāsvaraś cāprabhāsvaraś ca jaḍaḥ paṭuḥ parītto mahadgato 'pramāṇaḥ pariśuddho 'pariśuddhaś ceti /
T06srabhu_u:4453: apramāṇaśraddhāchandasahagataḥ, anantam vā aparyantam ālambanam adhimucyate yo 'dhimokṣaḥ
T06srabhu_u:4457: apariśuddho vā punaḥ yo na subhāvito na pariniṣpanno na paryavasānagataḥ
T06srabhu_u:4465: tatrāśrayanirodhaḥ prayogamanasikārabhāvanānuyuktasya yo dauṣṭhulyasahagata āśrayaḥ so 'nupūrveṇa nirudhyate, prasrabdhisahagataś cāśrayaḥ parivartate /
T06srabhu_u:4468: asty ālambanaparijñānam ālambanābhiratir āśrayanirodhaparivartapūrvaṃgamam, yac cālambanaparijñānam ālambanābhiratiṃ cādhipatiṃ kṛtvāśrayo nirudhyate
T06srabhu_u:4470: asty ālambanaparijñānam ālambanābhiratir āśrayaviśuddhipūrvaṃgamam āśrayaśuddhim adhipatiṃ kṛtvā suviśuddham ālambanajñānaṃ kāryapariniṣpattikāle pravartate, abhiratiś ca /
T06srabhu_u:4479: tatra manaskārādikarmikas tatprathamakarmika ekāgratāyāṃ yāvan manaskāraṃ na prāpnoti cittaikāgratāṃ na spṛśati /
T06srabhu_u:4485: lakṣaṇapratisaṃvedinaṃ manaskāram sthāpayitvā tadanyeṣu ṣaṭsu manaskāreṣu prayoganiṣṭhāparyanteṣu kṛtaparicayo bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:4487: atikrānto 'sau bhavati prayogabhāvanāmanaskāram, sthito bhavati bhāvanāphale /
T06srabhu_u:4489: api ca kuśalaṃ dharmacchandam upādāya prayujyamāno yāvan nirvedhabhāgīyāni kuśalamūlāni notpādayati tāvad ādikarmiko bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:4490: yadā punar nirvedhabhāgīyāny utpādayati, tadyathā ūṣmagatāni mūrdhānaḥ
T06srabhu_u:4491: (Śbh II 170) satyānulomāḥ kṣāntayo laukikā agradharmāḥ, tadā kṛtaparicayo bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:4492: yadā punaḥ samyaktvaṃ nyāmam avakrāmati satyāny abhisamāgacchaty aparapratyayo bhavaty ananyaneyaḥ śāstuḥ śāsane, tadātikrāntamanaskāro bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:4502: tadyathā laukikamārgaprayuktaḥ sarvāsv adharimāsu bhūmiṣv ādīnavasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayati /
T06srabhu_u:4503: nirvāṇāya vā punaḥ prayuktaḥ prahāṇadhātau virāgadhātau nirodhadhātau śāntadarśī prahāṇasaṃjñāṃ virāgasaṃjñāṃ nirodhasaṃjñāṃ ca bhāvayati /
T06srabhu_u:4504: śamathāya vā punaḥ prayukta ūrdhvamadhaḥsaṃjñāṃ śamathapakṣyāṃ bhāvayati /
T06srabhu_u:4506: tatrordhvamadhaḥsaṃjñī imam eva kāyaṃ yathāsthitaṃ yathāpraṇihitam ūrdhvaṃ pādatalād adhaḥ keśamastakāt pūrṇaṃ nānāvidhasyāśuceḥ pratyavekṣate /
T06srabhu_u:4507: santy asmin kāye keśā romāṇīti pūrvavat /
T06srabhu_u:4509: yathāpi tad ekatyena pratyavekṣaṇānimittam eva sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca sūdgṛhītaṃ bhavati sumanasīkṛtam sujuṣṭaṃ supratividdham /
T06srabhu_u:4510: tadyathā sthito niṣaṇṇaṃ pratyavekṣate, niṣaṇṇo vā nipannam, purato vā gacchantaṃ pṛṣṭhato gacchan pratyavekṣate /
T06srabhu_u:4511: sā khalv eṣā traiyadhvikānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ pratītyasamutpannānāṃ vipaśyanākārā pratyavekṣā paridīpitā /
T06srabhu_u:4512: tatra yat tāvad āha "sthito niṣaṇṇaṃ pratyavekṣata" ity anena paridīpitaṃ
T06srabhu_u:4516: anāgatā punar jñeyāvasthā anutpannatvād utpādābhimukhatvāc ca "niṣaṇṇe"ty ucyate /
T06srabhu_u:4517: yat punar āha "niṣaṇṇo vā nipannaṃ pratyavekṣata" ity anena pratyutpannena
T06srabhu_u:4521: yat punar āha "purato vā gacchantaṃ pṛṣṭhato gacchan pratyavekṣata" ity anena pratyutpannena manaskāreṇānantaraniruddhasya manaskārasya pratyavekṣā paridīpitā /
T06srabhu_u:4524: tatra yo 'nantarotpanno 'nantarotpanno manaskāro navanavo 'nantaraniruddhasyānantaraniruddhasya grāhakaḥ sa pṛṣṭhato yāyī /
T06srabhu_u:4525: tatra śamathaṃ ca vipaśyanāṃ ca bhāvayaṃs tadubhayapakṣyām ālokasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayati /
T06srabhu_u:4528: yaḥ saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇām abhyāsaḥ paricaya āsevanā bhāvanā bahulīkāra iyam ucyate bodhipakṣyabhāvanā /
T06srabhu_u:4531: pañcānāṃ balānām, saptānāṃ bodhyaṅgānām, āryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya /
T06srabhu_u:4533: anutpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādāya cchandaiḥ janayati vyāyacchate vīryam ārabhate cittaṃ pragṛhṇāti pradadhātīti
T06srabhu_u:4534: samyakprahāṇasya, utpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya,
T06srabhu_u:4535: anutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām utpādāya, utpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām
T06srabhu_u:4537: janayati vyāyacchate vīryam ārabhate cittaṃ pragṛhṇāti pradadhātīti samyakprahāṇasya /
T06srabhu_u:4543: samyagdṛṣṭeḥ samyaksaṃkalpasya samyagvākkarmāntājīvānām samyagvyāyāmasya samyaksmṛteḥ samyaksamādheś ca //
T06srabhu_u:4553: ca, dauṣṭhulyasahagataḥ praśrabdhisahagataś ca, bhūtakāyo bhautikakāyaś ca, nāmakāyo rūpakāyaś ca, nārakas tairyagyonikaḥ paitṛviṣayiko mānuṣyako divyaś ca, savijñānako 'vijñānako vā, antaḥkāyo bahiḥkāyaś ca, vipariṇato
T06srabhu_u:4554: 'vipariṇataś ca, strīkāyaḥ puruṣakāyaḥ paṇḍakakāyaś ca, mitrakāyo
T06srabhu_u:4555: 'mitrakāya udāsīnakāyaś ca, hīnakāyo madhyakāyaḥ praṇītakāyaś ca,
T06srabhu_u:4559: yā kāyam adhipatiṃ kṛtvā śrutamayī vā prajñā cintāmayī vā bhāvanāmayī vā, yayā prajñayā sarvaṃ kāyaṃ sarvākāraṃ samyag
T06srabhu_u:4561: tatra smṛtir yad asya kāyam adhipatiṃ kṛtvā ye dharmā udgṛhītās teṣām eva ca dharmāṇāṃ yo 'rthaś cintito ye ca bhāvanayā sākṣātkṛtāḥ, tatra vyañjane cārthe ca sākṣātkriyāyāṃ ca taccetaso 'saṃmoṣaḥ, "sūdgṛhītā vā ma ete
T06srabhu_u:4562: dharmāḥ", "na ve"ti, "sūpalakṣitā vā tatra tatra prajñayā", "na ve"ti,
T06srabhu_u:4563: "susaṃsparśitāḥ tatra tatra vimuktyā", "na ve"ti smṛtir upasthitā bhavati
T06srabhu_u:4566: api ca smṛtyārakṣāyai smṛter upasthānaṃ viṣayāsaṃkleśāyālambanopanibandhāya ca /
T06srabhu_u:4567: tatra smṛtyārakṣā yathoktaṃ pūrvam ev"ārakṣitasmṛtir bhavati nipakasmṛtir"
T06srabhu_u:4575: tadyathā vyāpiny ālambane caritaviśodhane kauśalyālambane kleśaviśodhane vā /
T06srabhu_u:4576: ebhis tribhir ākārair yā sūpasthitasmṛtitā, idam ucyate smṛter upasthānam
T06srabhu_u:4578: tadyathā sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca vedanā /
T06srabhu_u:4583: gardhāśritā, naiṣkramyāśritā vedanā sukhāpi duḥkhāpy aduḥkhāsukhāpi /
T06srabhu_u:4584: saiṣā ekaviṃśatividhā vedanā bhavati, navavidhā vā //
T06srabhu_u:4587: tadyathā sarāgaṃ cittaṃ vigatarāgaṃ sadveṣaṃ vigatadveṣaṃ samohaṃ vigatamohaṃ saṃkṣiptaṃ vikṣiptaṃ līnaṃ pragṛhītam uddhatam anuddhataṃ vyupaśāntam avyupaśāntaṃ samāhitam asamāhitaṃ subhāvitam asubhāvitaṃ suvimuktaṃ cittam asuvimuktaṃ cittam /
T06srabhu_u:4588: tad etad abhisamasya viṃśatividhaṃ cittaṃ bhavati //
T06srabhu_u:4591: rāgo rāgavinayaś ca, dveṣo dveṣavinayaś ca, moho mohavinayaś ca, saṃkṣepo vikṣepo layaḥ pragraha auddhatyam anauddhatyaṃ
T06srabhu_u:4592: vyupaśamo 'vyupaśamaḥ, susamāhitatā na susamāhitatā subhāvitamārgatā na subhāvitamārgatā suvimuktatā na suvimuktatā ca /
T06srabhu_u:4594: tatra sukhā vedanā yat sukhavedanīyam sparśaṃ pratītyotpadyate sātaṃ veditaṃ vedanāgatam /
T06srabhu_u:4595: sā punar yā pañcavijñānasaṃprayuktā sā kāyikī, yā punar manovijñānasaṃprayuktā sā caitasikī
T06srabhu_u:4596: yathā sukhavedanīyam evaṃ duḥkhavedanīyam aduḥkhāsukhavedanīyam sparśaṃ pratītyotpadyate 'sātaṃ naiva sātaṃ nāsātaṃ veditaṃ vedanāgatam /
T06srabhu_u:4598: sā punar yā pañcavijñānakāyasaṃprayuktā sā kāyikī, yā manovijñānasaṃprayuktā sā
T06srabhu_u:4600: yā nirvāṇānukūlā nairvedhikī atyantaniṣṭhatāyā atyantavimalatāyā atyantabrahmacaryaparyavasānāyai saṃvartate sā nirāmiṣā /
T06srabhu_u:4601: yā punar dhātupatitā bhavapatitā sā sāmiṣā /
T06srabhu_u:4602: yā punā rūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktā vairāgyānukūlā vā sā naiṣkramyāśritā /
T06srabhu_u:4603: yā punaḥ kāmapratisaṃyuktā na ca vairāgyānukūlā sā gardhāśritā //
T06srabhu_u:4605: tatra sarāgaṃ cittaṃ yad rañjanīye vastuni rāgaparyavasthitam /
T06srabhu_u:4609: tatra saṃmohaṃ yan mohanīye vastuni mohaparyauasthitam /
T06srabhu_u:4611: tāny etāni ṣaṭ cittāni cārasahagatāni veditavyāni /
T06srabhu_u:4614: vikṣiptaṃ yad bahirdhā pañcasu kāmaguṇeṣv anuvisṛtam /
T06srabhu_u:4618: anuddhataṃ cittaṃ yat pragrahakāle cābhisaṃkṣepakāle copekṣāprāptam /
T06srabhu_u:4619: tatra vyupaśāntaṃ cittaṃ yan nivaraṇebhyo vimuktam /
T06srabhu_u:4621: tatra samāhitaṃ cittaṃ yan nivaraṇavimokṣān mauladhyānapraviṣṭam /
T06srabhu_u:4623: tatra subhāvitaṃ cittaṃ yat tasyaiva samādher dīrghakālaparicayān nikāmalābhī bhavaty akṛcchralābhy āśusaṃpattā /
T06srabhu_u:4624: tatra na subhāvitam cittam etadviparyayeṇa veditavyam /
T06srabhu_u:4626: tatra suvimuktaṃ cittaṃ yat sarvataś cātyantataś ca vimuktam /
T06srabhu_u:4627: na suvimuktaṃ cittaṃ yan na sarvato nāpy atyantato vimuktam /
T06srabhu_u:4629: tatra nivaraṇaviśuddhibhūmim ārabhya vihāragatāny aṣṭau cittāni /
T06srabhu_u:4630: saṃkṣiptaṃ vitkṣiptaṃ yāvad vyupaśāntam avyupaśāntam iti /
T06srabhu_u:4631: kleśaviśuddhiṃ punar ārabhya vihāragatāni ṣaṭ cittāni /
T06srabhu_u:4632: yāvat suvimuktaṃ cittaṃ na suvimuktam iti /
T06srabhu_u:4633: yat punaḥ saty adhyātmaṃ nivaraṇe "asti me nivaraṇam" iti jānāti, asati nivaraṇe "nāsti me nivaraṇam" iti janāti /
T06srabhu_u:4634: yathā cānutpannasya nivaraṇasyotpādo bhavati tad api prajānāti, yathā cotpannasya vigamo
T06srabhu_u:4636: tatra sati cakṣuḥsaṃyojane yāvan manaḥsaṃyojane "asti me yāvan manaḥsamyojanam" iti, asati yāvan manaḥsaṃyojane "nāsti me yāvan manaḥsaṃyojanam" iti prajānāti /
T06srabhu_u:4637: yathā cānutpannasya yāvan manaḥsaṃyojanasyotpādo bhavati tad api prajānāti, yathā cotpannasya nirodho bhavati tad api prajānāti /
T06srabhu_u:4638: saty adhyātmam smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅge "asti me smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅgam" iti
T06srabhu_u:4640: yathā cānutpannasya smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅgasyotpādo bhavati tad api prajānāti, yathā cotpannasya sthitir bhavaty asaṃmoṣo bhāvanāparipūribhūyobhāvavṛddhivipulatā tad api
T06srabhu_u:4643: yad evaṃ svabhāvanidānādīnavapratipakṣākāraiḥ saṃkliṣṭadharmaparijñānam idaṃ śarīraṃ dharmasmṛtyupasthānasya
T06srabhu_u:4644: yathā kāye kāyānupaśyanā smṛtyupasthānam uktam evaṃ vedanāyāṃ citte dharmeṣu yathāyogaṃ veditavyam
T06srabhu_u:4645: tatra katham adhyātmaṃ kāye kāyānudarśī viharati, kathaṃ bahirdhā, katham adhyātmabahirdhā
T06srabhu_u:4646: yadā adhyātmaṃ pratyātmaṃ sattvasaṃkhyāte kāye kāyānupaśyī viharati, evam adhyātmaṃ kāye kāyānudarśī viharati /
T06srabhu_u:4647: yadā bahirdhā asattvasaṃkhyātaṃ rūpam ālambanīkaroti, evaṃ bahirdhā kāye
T06srabhu_u:4649: yadā bahirdhā parakyaṃ sattvasaṃkhyātaṃ rūpam ālambanīkaroti, evam adhyātmabahirdhā kāye kāyānudarśī viharati /
T06srabhu_u:4650: tatrādhyātmaṃ rūpam upādāya svakyaṃ sattvasaṃkhyātaṃ yā utpannā vedanā cittaṃ dharmās tān ālambanīkurvann adhyātmaṃ vedanāsu citte dharmeṣu dharmānudarśī viharati /
T06srabhu_u:4651: bāhyam asattvasaṃkhyātaṃ rūpam upādāya yā utpannā vedanā cittaṃ dharmās tān ālambanīkurvan bahirdhā vedanāyāṃ citte dharmeṣu dharmānudarśī viharati /
T06srabhu_u:4653: bahirdhā bāhyaṃ rūpaṃ sattvasaṃkhyātam upādāya yā utpannā vedanā cittaṃ dharmās tān ālambanīkurvann adhyātmabahirdhā vedanāyāṃ citte dharmeṣu dharmānudarśī viharati //
T06srabhu_u:4655: indriyasaṃgṛhītaṃ rūpam ālambanīkurvann adhyātmaṃ kāye kāyānupaśyī viharati /
T06srabhu_u:4656: anindriyasaṃgṛhītaṃ rūpam anupagatam anupādattam ālambanīkurvan bahirdhā kāye kāyānudarśī viharati /
T06srabhu_u:4657: anindriyasaṃgṛhītam eva rūpam adhyātmam upagatam upādattaṃ rūpam ālambanīkurvann adhyātmabahirdhā kāye kāyānupaśyī viharati /
T06srabhu_u:4658: evaṃ pūrvaṃ trividhaṃ rūpam upādāya yā utpannā vedanā cittaṃ dharmās tān yathāyogam ālambanīkurvaṃs tathādarśī viharatīti veditavyam //
T06srabhu_u:4660: yat samāhitabhūmikaṃ praśrabdhisahagataṃ rūpam ālambanīkaroty evam adhyātmaṃ kāye kāyānudarśī viharati /
T06srabhu_u:4661: yat svakyam evādhyātmam asamāhitabhūmikaṃ dauṣṭhulyasahagataṃ rūpam ālambanīkaroty evaṃ bahirdhā kāye kāyānupaśyī viharati /
T06srabhu_u:4662: parakyaṃ dauṣṭhulyasahagataṃ praśrabdhisahagataṃ ca rūpam ālambanīkurvann adhyātmabahirdhā (Śbh II 192)
T06srabhu_u:4663: kāye kāyānudarśī viharaty evaṃ tad upādāyotpannā vedanā cittaṃ dharmā yathāyogaṃ veditavyāḥ
T06srabhu_u:4665: adhyātmaṃ bhūtarūpam ālambanīkurvann adhyātmaṃ kāye kāyānudarśī viharati /
T06srabhu_u:4666: bāhyaṃ bhūtarūpam ālambanīkurvan bahirdhā kāye kāyānudarśī viharati /
T06srabhu_u:4667: tac ca bhūtarūpam upādāya yad utpannam indriyaviṣayasaṃgṛhītam upādāyarūpaṃ cālambanīkurvann adhyātmabahirdhā kāye kāyānudarśī viharati /
T06srabhu_u:4668: evaṃ tad upādāya yā utpannā vedanā cittaṃ dharmās te 'pi yathāyogaṃ veditavyāḥ //
T06srabhu_u:4670: yadā savijñānakaṃ kāyam adhyātmam ālambanīkaroty evam adhyātmaṃ kāye kāyānudarśī viharati
T06srabhu_u:4671: avijñānakaṃ rūpaṃ sattvasaṃkhyātaṃ vinīlakādiṣv avasthāsv ālambanīkurvan bahirdhā kāye kāyānudarśī viharati /
T06srabhu_u:4672: avijñānakasya ca rūpasyātīte kāle savijñānatāṃ savijñānakasya ca rūpasyānāgate kāle 'vijñānatāṃ tulyadharmatāṃ samadharmatām ālambanīkurvann adhyātmabahirdhā kāye kāyānudarśī viharati evaṃ tad upādāya yā utpannā vedanā cittaṃ dharmās te 'pi yathāyogaṃ veditavyāḥ //
T06srabhu_u:4674: ātmano 'ntaḥkāyaṃ keśaromanakhādibhir ākārair ālambanīkurvann adhyātmaṃ kāye kāyānudarśī viharati /
T06srabhu_u:4675: pareṣām antaḥkāyaṃ keśaromanakhādibhir ākārair ālambanīkurvan bahirdhā kāye kāyānudarśī viharati
T06srabhu_u:4676: ātmanaś ca bahiḥkāyam avipariṇataṃ vinīlakādibhir ākāraiḥ (Śbh
T06srabhu_u:4677: II 194) pareṣāṃ ca bahiḥkāyaṃ vipariṇatam avipariṇataṃ ca vinīlakādibhir ākārais tulyadharmatayālambanīkurvann adhyātmabahirdhā kāye kāyānudarśī
T06srabhu_u:4679: tad upādāya yā utpannā vedanā cittaṃ dharmās te 'pi yathāyogaṃ veditavyāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:4680: ity evaṃbhāgīyāḥ kāyavedanācittadharmaprabhedena bahavaḥ paryāyā veditavyāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:4682: tatra caturṇāṃ viparyāsānāṃ pratipakṣeṇa bhagavatā catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni vyavasthāpitāni
T06srabhu_u:4684: tathā hi bhagavatā kāyasmṛtyupasthānabhāvanāyām aśubhāpratisamyuktāś catasraḥ śivapathikā deśitāḥ, yā asya bahulaṃkurvanmanasikurvataḥ, aśucau śucīti viparyāsaḥ prahīyate /
T06srabhu_u:4685: tatra duḥkhe sukham iti viparyāsapratipakṣeṇa vedanāsmṛtyupasthānaṃ vyavasthāpitam /
T06srabhu_u:4686: vedanāsu vedanānudarśī viharan "yat kiṃcid veditam idam
T06srabhu_u:4687: atra duḥkhasye"ti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti, evam asya yo duḥkhe sukham iti
T06srabhu_u:4689: tatra anitye nityam iti viparyāsapratipakṣeṇa cittasmṛtyupasthānaṃ vyavasthāpitam /
T06srabhu_u:4690: tasya sarāgādicittaprabhedena teṣāṃ teṣāṃ rātriṃdivasānām atyayāt kṣaṇalavamuhūrtānām anekavidhānāṃ bahunānāprakāratāṃ (Śbh II 196)
T06srabhu_u:4691: cittasyopalabhya yo 'nitye nityam iti viparyāsaḥ sa prahīyate /
T06srabhu_u:4693: tasya yeṣām ātmadṛṣṭyādikānāṃ saṃkleśānāṃ sadbhāvād yeṣām anātmadṛṣṭyādikānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām asadbhāvāt skandheṣv ātmadarśanaṃ
T06srabhu_u:4694: bhavati, nānyasya, svalakṣaṇataḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇataś ca dharmān dharmānudarśino yathābhūtaṃ paśyataḥ, yo 'nātmany ātmeti viparyāsaḥ sa
T06srabhu_u:4698: skandheṣu skandhamātraṃ dharmamātraṃ yathābhūtam aprajānan yathā "kāya āśritaḥ, yadāśritaś ca sukhaduḥkham upabhuñje", dharmādharmābhyām saṃkliśyate vyavadāyate ca /
T06srabhu_u:4702: yatraiva ca te citte manasi vijñāna ātmagrāheṇa saṃmūḍhā ātmavastusaṃmohāpanayanārthena cittasmṛtyupasthānaṃ vyavasthāpitam /
T06srabhu_u:4706: yatra ca karma karoti, yadarthaṃ ca karoti, yaś ca karma
T06srabhu_u:4707: karoti, yena ca karoti, tat sarvam ekadhyam abhisaṃkṣipya catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni vyavasthāpitāni, tatra kāye karoti vedanārthaṃ cittaṃ kuśalākuśalair dharmaiḥ //
T06srabhu_u:4709: yatra ca saṃkliśyate viśudhyate yataś ca yaś ca yena kliśyate viśudhyate, tad ekadhyam abhisaṃkṣipya catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni vyavasthāpitāni, tatra kāye saṃkliśyate viśudhyate ca vedanābhyaś cittaṃ dharmaiḥ saṃkliśyate viśudhyate ca //
T06srabhu_u:4713: yatra ca smṛtim upasthāpayati yena ca smṛtim upasthāpayati tad ucyate smṛtyupasthānam /
T06srabhu_u:4715: yena smṛtim upasthāpayati tatra yā prajñā smṛtiś ca samādhisaṃgrāhikā tat svabhāvasmṛtyupasthānam
T06srabhu_u:4717: api ca kāyavedanācittadharmādhipateyo yo mārgaḥ samutpannaḥ kuśalaḥ sāsravo 'nāsravaś ca tat smṛtyupasthānam /
T06srabhu_u:4718: sa punaḥ śrutamayaś cintāmayo bhāvanāmayaś ca /
T06srabhu_u:4719: tatra śrutacintāmayaḥ sāsrava eva, bhāvanāmayaḥ syāt sāsravaḥ syād anāsravaḥ //
T06srabhu_u:4721: sa evaṃ caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu kṛtaparicaya audārikaudārikaṃ viparyāsam apanīya kuśalākuśaladharmābhijñaḥ
T06srabhu_u:4722: tadanantaram "anutpannānāiḥ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādāya, utpannānāṃ prahāṇāya, anutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām utpādāya, utpannānām sthitaya" iti vistareṇa pūrvavad
T06srabhu_u:4725: yat kāmāvacaraṃ kliṣṭaṃ kāyakarma vākkarma manaskarma kāyavāṅmanoduścaritasaṃgṛhītam, ye ca
T06srabhu_u:4726: kleśās te punar ye 'samavahitā asaṃmukhībhūtās te 'nutpannāḥ, ye samavahitāḥ saṃmukhībhūtās ta utpannāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:4727: tatra kuśalā dharmā ye tatprātipakṣikā dharmā duścaritaprātipakṣikā nivaraṇaprātipakṣikāḥ saṃyojanaprātipakṣikā vā /
T06srabhu_u:4728: te 'py anutpannās tathaiva veditavyā utpannāś ca yathā pāpakā akuśalā dharmāḥ //
T06srabhu_u:4729: tatra yadānutpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādāya spṛhām utpādayati praṇidhatte "sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā notpādayiṣyāmī"ti, evaṃ chandaṃ janayati /
T06srabhu_u:4730: utpannān vā punaḥ samavahitān "sarveṇa sarvaṃ nādhivāsayiṣyāmi prahāsyāmi prativinodayiṣyāmi"
T06srabhu_u:4731: yad anutpanneṣu pāpakeṣv akuśaleṣu dharmeṣu pūrvam evānutpādāya spṛhām utpādayati praṇidhatte nādhivāsayitukāmo bhavati, ayam anutpannānām (Śbh
T06srabhu_u:4735: te punaḥ pāpakā akuśalā dharmā atītavastvālambanā vā anāgatavastvālambanā vā vartamānaviṣayālambanā votpadyante, te bhavanti parokṣaviṣayālambanāḥ
T06srabhu_u:4740: tatra parokṣaviṣayālambanānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpannānām
T06srabhu_u:4742: pratyakṣaviṣayālambanānāṃ punar anutpannānām anutpādāyotpannānāṃ ca prahāṇāya vīryam ārabhate
T06srabhu_u:4743: tathā hi teṣāṃ dṛḍhatareṇa vīryārambheṇānutpattiḥ prahāṇaṃ vā bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:4744: api ca mṛdumadhyānāṃ paryavasthānānām anutpannānām anutpādāya, utpannānāṃ prahāṇāya uyāyacchate
T06srabhu_u:4746: anutpādāya, utpannānāṃ ca prahānāya vīryam ārabhate /
T06srabhu_u:4747: saced atīta ālambane carati, tathā carati yathāsya tenālambanena kleśo notpadyate /
T06srabhu_u:4748: sacet punaḥ smṛtisaṃpramoṣād utpadyate nādhivāsayati prajahāti vinodayati vyantīkaroti /
T06srabhu_u:4751: (Śbh II 204) evam ayam anutpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādāyotpannānāṃ ca prahāṇāya "vyāyacchata" ity ucyate /
T06srabhu_u:4752: saced ayaṃ vartamāna ālambane carati, tathā tathā carati yathā tenālambanena kleśo notpadyate
T06srabhu_u:4753: sacet punaḥ smṛtisaṃpramoṣād utpadyata utpannaṃ nādhivāsayati prajahāti vinodayati vyantīkaroti
T06srabhu_u:4754: evam anutpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādāyotpannānāṃ ca prahāṇāya "vīryam ārabhata" ity ucyate //
T06srabhu_u:4755: santi pāpakā akuśalā dharmā ye saṃkalpavaśenotpadyante na viṣayabalena,
T06srabhu_u:4756: santi ye saṃkalpabalena ca viṣayabalena ca /
T06srabhu_u:4757: tatra saṃkalpavaśenotpadyante na uiṣayabalena, tadyathā viharato 'tītānāgatālambanena ya utpadyante /
T06srabhu_u:4758: tatra saṃkalpavaśena ca viṣayabalena cotpadyante, tadyathā carato vartamānenālambanenotpadyante, avaśyaṃ tatrāyoniśaḥsaṃkalpo bhavati //
T06srabhu_u:4759: tatra ye saṃkalpabalenotpadyante teṣām anutpannānām anutpādāya, utpannānāṃ ca prahāṇāya vyāyacchate
T06srabhu_u:4760: tatra ye viṣayabalena saṃkalpabalena cotpadyante teṣām anutpannānām anutpādāya, utpannānāṃ ca prahāṇāya vīryam ārabhate //
T06srabhu_u:4762: tatr"ānutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām utpādāya cchandaṃ janayatī"ti /
T06srabhu_u:4763: ye kuśalā dharmā apratilabdhā asaṃmukhībhūtāś ca teṣāṃ pratilambhāya saṃmukhībhāvāya ca spṛhām utpādayati cittaṃ praṇidhatte, tīvrā pratilabdhukāmatā saṃmukhīkartukāmatā cāsya pratyupasthitā bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:4766: "utpannānāṃ ca kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām sthitaye 'saṃmoṣāya bhāvanāparipūraye chandaṃ janayatī"ti, "utpannāḥ kuśalā dharmā" ye pratilabdhāḥ saṃmukhībhūtāś ca /
T06srabhu_u:4770: teṣām eva ca kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pratilabdhānāṃ saṃmukhībhūtānām āsevanānvayāt pariniṣpattiṃ niṣṭhāgamanam adhikṛtyāha "bhāvanāparipūraya" iti /
T06srabhu_u:4771: tatra ca spṛhām utpādayati cittaṃ praṇidhatte tīvrā cāsya sthitikāmatā asaṃmoṣakāmatā bhāvanāparipūrikāmatā pratyupasthitā bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:4772: ayam ucyata "utpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sthitaye 'saṃmoṣāya bhāvanāparipūraye chandaḥ"
T06srabhu_u:4779: api ca mṛdumadhyānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpannānām utpādāya, utpannānāṃ ca sthitaye 'saṃmoṣāya vyāyacchate /
T06srabhu_u:4780: adhimātrāṇāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpannānām utpādāya, utpannānāṃ ca yāvad bhāvanāparipūraye vīryam ārabhate /
T06srabhu_u:4782: yadā tac cittaṃ śamathabhāvanāyām ekāgratāyāṃ prayuktaṃ bhavati, anutpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādāya,
T06srabhu_u:4783: (Śbh II 208) evaṃ vistareṇa yāvad utpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sthitaye
T06srabhu_u:4784: 'saṃmoṣāya bhāvanāparipūraye tac ca tathādhyātmam abhisaṃkṣiptaṃ līnatvāya
T06srabhu_u:4786: tadānyatamānyatamena pragrāhakeṇa nimittena prasadanīyena pratigṛhṇāti saṃharṣayati /
T06srabhu_u:4789: punar uddhatam auddhatyābhiśaṅki vā pragrahakāle paśyati, tadā punar apy adhyātmam abhisaṃkṣipati śamathāya praṇidadhāti //
T06srabhu_u:4791: kṛṣṇapakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇām anutpannānām anutpādāya, utpannānāṃ ca prahāṇāya cchando vyāyāmo vīryārambhaś cittapragrahaḥ pradadhanam ime dve samyakprahāṇe /
T06srabhu_u:4792: śuklapakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇām anutpannānām utpādāya, vistareṇa dve samyakprahāṇe veditavye /
T06srabhu_u:4794: tatraikaṃ saṃvaraṇaprahāṇam, yad "utpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya cchandaṃ janayatī"ti vistareṇa /
T06srabhu_u:4795: dvitīyaṃ prahāṇaprahāṇam, yad "anutpannānām anutpādāya cchandaṃ janayatī"ti vistareṇa /
T06srabhu_u:4797: anutpannaṃ ca yat tad asamudācārataḥ prahīṇam eva tad asaṃmukhībhāvataḥ prahātavyaṃ iti kṛtvā, prahīṇasya praḥāṇaṃ prahāṇaprahāṇam /
T06srabhu_u:4800: "anutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām utpādāye"ti vistareṇa yāvac "cittaṃ pragṛhṇāti pradadhātī"ti
T06srabhu_u:4802: tathā hi kuśalā dharmā āsevyamānā bhāvyamānā, apratilabdhāś ca pratilabhyante, pratilabdhāś ca saṃmukhīkriyante /
T06srabhu_u:4805: "utpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sthitaye" vistareṇa yāvac "cittaṃ pragṛhṇāti, pradadhāti"
T06srabhu_u:4806: tathā hi pratilabdheṣu saṃmukhīkṛteṣu ca kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu yā pramādavarjanā apramādaniṣevaṇā ca sā kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sthitaye, asaṃmoṣāya,
T06srabhu_u:4808: evam utpannāḥ kuśalā dharmā anurakṣitā bhavanti /
T06srabhu_u:4812: kṛṣṇaśuklapakṣikasya tyāgādānavastuno 'dhyāśayasaṃpat prayogasaṃpac ca paridīpitā bhavati
T06srabhu_u:4816: yat prahātavyasya vastunaḥ prahāṇāya prāptavyasya ca vastunaḥ prāptaye pūrvam eva spṛhājātena bhavitavyam, paryavasthānaprahāṇāya vīryam ārabdhavyam anuśayaprahāṇāya ca, kālena kālaṃ śamathapragrahopekṣānimittāni bhāvayitavyāni (Śbh II 212) /
T06srabhu_u:4817: paryavasthānaprahāṇānuśayaprahāṇāya ca ye pratipakṣikā dharmāḥ kuśalās te samudānayitavyāḥ
T06srabhu_u:4818: tac caitat sarvaṃ caturbhiḥ samyakprahāṇaiḥ paridīpitaṃ bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:4823: tatra cchandam adhipatiṃ kṛtvā yaḥ pratilabhyate samādhir ayaṃ chandasamādhiḥ /
T06srabhu_u:4824: vīryam, cittam, mīmāṃsām adhipatiṃ kṛtvā yaḥ pratilabhyate samādhir ayaṃ mīmāṃsāsamādhiḥ //
T06srabhu_u:4825: yadā tāvad ayaṃ chandam eva kevalaṃ janayati /
T06srabhu_u:4826: chandajātaś ca tān pāpakān akuśalān dharmān svabhāvato nidānata ādīnavataḥ pratipakṣataś ca
T06srabhu_u:4828: evaṃ kuśalān dharmān svabhāvato nidānato 'nuśaṃsato niḥsaraṇataḥ samyag evopanidadhyāti,
T06srabhu_u:4829: ekāgrāṃ smṛtim avasthāpayati, tadbahulākārād ekāgratām spṛśati
T06srabhu_u:4834: sa atīte vānāgatapratyutpanne vā punar ālambane pāpakākuśaladharmasthānīye
T06srabhu_u:4836: utpannasya vā prahāṇāya, vyāyacchamāno vīryam ārabhamāṇaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:4838: vicarataḥ, tasya vālambanasya svabhāvato nidānata ādīnavataḥ pratipakṣataś
T06srabhu_u:4839: ca samyag upanidhyāyataḥ, ekāgrāṃ smṛtim upasthāpayataḥ, yat tadbahulavihāriṇaś cittaikāgratā utpadyate paryavasthānasamudācāradūrīkaraṇayogena /
T06srabhu_u:4840: na tv adyāpy anuśayaṃ samudghātayati pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām /
T06srabhu_u:4842: līnaṃ vā punaś cittaṃ pragṛhṇataḥ, pragṛhītaṃ cittaṃ samādadhataḥ, kālena ca kālam adhyupekṣito yat pāpakākuśalān dharmān
T06srabhu_u:4843: pāpakākuśaladharmasthānīyānvayān, kuśalākuśalān dharmān kuśalākuśalasthānīyāṃś ca dharmān svabhāvato nidānata ādīnavato
T06srabhu_u:4844: 'nuśaṃsataḥ pratipakṣato niḥsaraṇataḥ, samyag upanidhyāyataḥ, ekāgrāṃ smṛtim upasthāpayataḥ, (Śbh II 216) tadbahulavihāriṇo yā utpadyante
T06srabhu_u:4848: tatra ye pāpakākuśaladharmasthānīyā dharmā bhavanty ayoniśomanasikurvataḥ
T06srabhu_u:4850: tasyaivaṃ paryavasthāneṣu dūrīkṛteṣu, paryavasthānapratipakṣikeṣu ca samādhipramukheṣu dharmeṣv utpanneṣu, te pāpakā akuśalā dharmā na samudācaranti /
T06srabhu_u:4852: "kiṃ sataḥ saṃvidyamānān pāpakān akuśalān dharmān na
T06srabhu_u:4853: pratisaṃvedayāmy āhosvid asato 'saṃvidyamānān yan nv ahaṃ parimīmāṃseyam"
T06srabhu_u:4854: / sa mīmāṃsāmanaskāram adhipatiṃ kṛtvā prahīṇāprahīṇatāṃ mīmāṃsate, samyag
T06srabhu_u:4858: "paryavasthānamātrakān me cittaṃ vimuktaṃ na tu sarveṇa sarvam anuśayebhyaḥ, tatpratipakṣāś ca me
T06srabhu_u:4859: samādhipramukhāḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ pratilabdhā, bhāvitā, na tv anuśayaprātipakṣikā" iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T06srabhu_u:4862: sa taṃ caturvidhaṃ samādhim adhipatiṃ kṛtvā paryavasthāneṣu dūrīkṛteṣu,
T06srabhu_u:4863: sarveṇa sarvam anuśayasamudghātāya pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tatprātipakṣikāṇāñ ca kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ samudāgamāya punar api chandaṃ janayati vyāyacchata iti vistareṇa caturbhiḥ samyakprahāṇaiḥ prayujyate //
T06srabhu_u:4867: tadyathā chandaḥ "kadācit samādhiṃ paripūrayiṣyāmi, anuśayāṃś ca prahāsyāmi pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām" /
T06srabhu_u:4869: śraddhā yā avinyastaprayogasya viharata uttare 'dhigame śraddadhānatā,
T06srabhu_u:4871: tatra praśrabdhir yac chraddhāprasādapūrvaṃgamaṃ prāmodyaṃ prītiḥ,
T06srabhu_u:4873: tatra smṛtir yā navākārā, navākārāyāś cittasthiteḥ śamathapakṣyāyāḥ
T06srabhu_u:4877: tatra cetanā yaś cittābhisaṃskāraḥ prahīṇāprahīṇatāṃ mīmāṃsamānasya yaś cittābhisaṃskāraḥ śamathavipaśyanānukūlaḥ kāyakarma vākkarma samutthāpayati /
T06srabhu_u:4878: tatropekṣā yātitānāgatapratyutpanneṣu pāpakākuśaladharmasthānīyeṣu carataś cittāsaṃkleśā cittasamatā
T06srabhu_u:4879: ābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ prahīṇatām anuśayānāṃ paricchinatti jānāti /
T06srabhu_u:4883: tatra chandaś chanda eva, yo vyāyāma idaṃ vīryam, yā śraddhā sā śraddhā, yā ca praśrabdhir yā ca smṛtir yac ca saṃprajanyaṃ yā ca cetanā yā copekṣā ayam upāyaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:4884: tad idaṃ sarvam abhisamasya, ye ca pūrvakāś chandasamādhayaḥ, ye ceme prahāṇasaṃskārāḥ prahīṇeṣv anuśayeṣu pariniṣpanne samādhau,
T06srabhu_u:4890: tadyathā yasya pādaḥ saṃvidyate so 'bhikramapratikramaparākramasamartho bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:4891: evam eva yasyaite dharmāḥ saṃvidyante, eṣa ca samādhiḥ saṃvidyate paripūrṇaḥ, sa evaṃ pariśuddhe citte, paryavadāte, anaṅgaṇe, vigatopakleśe, ṛjubhūte,
T06srabhu_u:4894: eṣā hi parā ṛddhiḥ parā samṛddhiḥ, yaduta lokottarā dharmāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:4896: sa evaṃ samādhipratiṣṭhitaḥ samādhiṃ niśrityādhicittaṃśikṣāyām adhiprajñaṃśikṣāyāṃ yogaṃ karoti
T06srabhu_u:4897: tatrāsya yogaṃ kurvataḥ pareṣāṃ cādhigame śāstuḥ śrāvakāṇāṃ ca yo 'bhisaṃpratyayaḥ prasādaḥ
T06srabhu_u:4902: ye 'pi te vīryādayas teṣām api lokottaradharmotpattaya ādhipatyam /
T06srabhu_u:4908: yā punaḥ pūrveṇāparaṃ viśeṣādhigamaṃ saṃjānatas tadanusāreṇa taduttaralokottaradharmādhigamāyābhisaṃpratyayaḥ prasādaḥ śraddadhānatā /
T06srabhu_u:4912: asaṃhāryā sā śraddhā devena vā, māreṇa vā, brahmaṇā vā,
T06srabhu_u:4913: kenacid vā punar loke sahadharmeṇa, kleśaparyavasthānena vā /
T06srabhu_u:4917: taiḥ sa balair balavān sarvaṃ mārabalaṃ vijitya prayujyata āsravāṇāṃ kṣayāya /
T06srabhu_u:4919: tatra yac ca śraddhendriyaṃ yac ca śraddhābalaṃ caturṣv etad avetyaprasādeṣu draṣṭavyam /
T06srabhu_u:4923: tasmād dhetuphalasaṃbandhena tasyās tad adhipatiphalam iti kṛtvā tatra draṣṭavyam ity uktaṃ bhagavatā, na tu taccharīratā
T06srabhu_u:4928: yāni darśanaprahātavyakleśaprahāṇāya prāyogikāṇi samyakprahāṇāni, tāny atra samyakprahāṇāny abhipretāni /
T06srabhu_u:4929: tāni hy atyantatāyai pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya saṃvartante /
T06srabhu_u:4936: iti yat satyajñānaṃ caturṇām āryasatyānām abhisamayāya saṃvartate śrāmaṇyaphalaprāptaye /
T06srabhu_u:4938: sa eṣām indriyāṇām eteṣāṃ ca balānām āsevanānvayād bhāvanānvayād bahulīkārānvayān nirvedhabhāgīyāni kuśalamūlāny utpādayati mṛdumadhyādhimātrāṇi /
T06srabhu_u:4941: adharāraṇyām uttarāraṇiṃ pratiṣṭhāpyābhimathnann utsahate ghaṭate vyāyacchate /
T06srabhu_u:4942: tasyotsahato ghaṭato vyāyacchataś ca tatprathamato 'dharāraṇyām ūṣmā jāyate /
T06srabhu_u:4948: yathābhimanthanavyāyāma evaṃ pañcānām indriyāṇām āsevanā draṣṭavyā /
T06srabhu_u:4951: pūrvaṃgamāni nimittabhūtāny agnisthānīyānām anāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kleśaparidāhakānām utpattaye
T06srabhu_u:4952: yathā tasyaivoṣmaṇa ūrdhvam āgamanam evaṃ mūrdhāno draṣṭavyāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:4953: yathā dhūmaprādurbhāva evaṃ satyānulomāḥ kṣāntayo draṣṭavyāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:4954: yathāgneḥ patanaṃ nirarciṣa evaṃ laukikāgradharmā draṣṭavyāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:4955: yathā tadanantaram arciṣa utpāda evaṃ lokottarānāsravā dharmā draṣṭavyāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:4956: ye laukikāgradharmasaṃgṛhītānāṃ pañcānām indriyāṇāṃ samanantaram utpadyante
T06srabhu_u:4960: yo 'sau yathābhūtāvabodhaḥ samyaktvanyāmāvakrāntasya pudgalasya tasyaitāny aṅgāni /
T06srabhu_u:4961: sa hi yathābhūtāvabodhaḥ saptāṅgaparigṛhītaḥ, tribhiḥ śamathapakṣyaiḥ, tribhir
T06srabhu_u:4964: tatra yaś ca dharmavicayaḥ, yac ca vīryam, yā ca prītir itīmāni trīṇi vipaśyanāpakṣyāṇi
T06srabhu_u:4965: tatra yā ca prasrabdhiḥ, yaś ca samādhiḥ, yā copekṣā (Śbh II 230) itīmāni trīṇi śamathapakṣyāṇi
T06srabhu_u:4967: sa tasmin samaye tatprathamato bodhyaṅgalābhāc chaikṣo bhavati dṛṣṭapadaḥ //
T06srabhu_u:4968: darśanaprahātavyāś cāsya kleśāḥ prahīṇā bhavanti, bhāvanāprahātavyāś cāvaśiṣṭāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:4969: sa teṣāṃ prahāṇāya triskandham āryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārgaṃ bhāvayati /
T06srabhu_u:4970: tatra yā ca samyagdṛṣṭir, yaś ca samyaksaṃkalpaḥ, yaś ca samyagvyāyāmaḥ,
T06srabhu_u:4973: tatra yā ca samyaksmṛtiḥ, yaś ca samyaksamādhiḥ, ayaṃ samādhiskandhaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:4976: āryasya śaikṣasya dṛṣṭapadasyāyaṃ mārga iyaṃ pratipad aṣṭābhir aṅgaiḥ saṃgṛhītaḥ, apariśeṣaḥ sarvakleśaprahāṇāya vimuktisākṣātkriyāyai /
T06srabhu_u:4978: tatra yaś ca bodhyaṅgakāle tattvāvabodhaḥ pratilabdhaḥ, pratilabhya ca yat
T06srabhu_u:4979: tasyaiva prajñayā vyavasthānaṃ karoti yathādhigatasyāvabodhasya, tad ubhayam ekadhyam abhisaṃkṣipya samyagdṛṣṭir ity ucyate /
T06srabhu_u:4980: tāṃ samyagdṛṣṭim adhipatiṃ kṛtvā yan naiṣkramyasaṃkalpaṃ saṃkalpayaty avyāpādasaṃkalpam avihiṃsāsaṃkalpam
T06srabhu_u:4982: sacet tāvad vitarkeṣu cittaṃ krāmati, sa evaṃrūpān vitarkān vitarkayati /
T06srabhu_u:4983: sacet punaḥ kathāyāṃ cittaṃ krāmati, samyagdṛṣṭim adhipatiṃ kṛtvā tenaiva kuśalāt saṃkalpād dharmyāṃ kathāṃ kathayati /
T06srabhu_u:4989: vihāragato vā punaḥ paryeṣiteṣu cīvarādiṣu gate sthite niṣaṇṇe yāvan nidrāklamaprativinodane saṃprajānadvihārī bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:4991: sa tac cīvaraṃ yāvad bhaiṣajyapariṣkāraṃ dharmeṇa paryeṣate /
T06srabhu_u:4994: ye punar viratisaṃgṛhītāḥ samyagvākkarmāntājīvāḥ, te 'nena pūrvam eva manaskāralābhād bodhyaṅgair eva saha labdhā bhavanti /
T06srabhu_u:4997: dīrghakālaṃ hy etad āryāṇāṃ satāṃ samyaggatānām iṣṭaṃ kāntaṃ priyaṃ mana-āpaṃ "kaccid ahaṃ tad vāgduścaritasya kāyaduścaritasya mithyājīvasyākaraṇaṃ saṃvaraṃ
T06srabhu_u:4999: yad asya dīrgharātram iṣṭaṃ kāntaṃ priyaṃ mana-āpaṃ tad anena tasmin samaye pratilabdhaṃ bhavati
T06srabhu_u:5001: tathā hi sa labdheṣv āryakānteṣu śīleṣu, na saṃprajāno mrṣāṃ vācaṃ
T06srabhu_u:5002: bhāṣate, na saṃcintya prāṇinaṃ jīvitād vyaparopayati, nādattam ādatte,
T06srabhu_u:5003: (Śbh II 234) na kāmeṣu mithyā carati, na cādharmeṇa cīvarādīni paryeṣate /
T06srabhu_u:5004: iti tāny āryakāntāni śīlāny adhipatiṃ kṛtvā mārgabhāvanākāle yā vāk pravartate yac ca kāyakarma yaś cājīvaḥ, te 'pi samyagvākkarmāntājīvā ity ucyante /
T06srabhu_u:5005: tasya samyagdṛṣṭisamyaksaṃkalpavākkarmāntājīvasanniśrayeṇa bhāvanāprayuktasya yac chando vīryo vyāyāmo niṣkramaḥ parākramasthāmārambhaś cetasaḥ saṃpragrahaḥ sātatyam /
T06srabhu_u:5007: yac catvāri smṛtyupasthānāny adhipatiṃ kṛtvāviparyāsasaṃgṛhītā smṛtir navākārā navākāracittasthitisaṃgrāhikā
T06srabhu_u:5009: tad etat sarvam abhisamasyāryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś cārakaraṇīye ca vihārakaraṇīye cāvasthitaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:5013: tatra yā ca samyagdṛṣṭiḥ, yaś ca samyaksaṃkalpaḥ, yaś ca samyagvyāyāma iyaṃ vipaśyanā /
T06srabhu_u:5014: tatra yā ca samyaksmṛtir yaś ca samyaksamādhir ayaṃ śamathaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:5015: evaṃ pariśuddhān vākkarmāntājīvān niśritya śamathavipaśyanāṃ bhāvayati kālena kālaṃ niravaśeṣasaṃyojanaprahāṇaṃ sākṣātkaroty agraphalam arhattvaṃ
T06srabhu_u:5017: prākarṣikaś ca bhāvanāmārgaḥ kālāntarābhyāsena kleśān prajahāti /
T06srabhu_u:5018: jñānamātrapratibaddhas tu darśanamārgo jñānotpattimātrakeṇa kleśān prajahāti /
T06srabhu_u:5020: iti ya evam eṣām anayānupūrvyā saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇām abhyāsaḥ paricayaḥ
T06srabhu_u:5030: api ca pūrvotpannasya mārgasya paścād utpanno mārgaḥ phalaṃ madhyo viśiṣṭo vā sadṛśo vā /
T06srabhu_u:5031: punas tatra kena kāraṇena catvāri vyavasthāpitāni /
T06srabhu_u:5034: tadyathā nirvastukānāṃ kleśānām apāyagamanīyānām apāyagamanahetubhūtānāṃ prahāṇāt pratipakṣotpādāc ca srota-āpattiphalaṃ vyavasthāpitam /
T06srabhu_u:5035: trayāṇāṃ tu saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād vyavasthāpitaṃ bhagavatā triṣu pakṣeṣu,
T06srabhu_u:5038: tatra gṛhipakṣe satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ, yayāyam ādita eva na prayujyata ity ādita uttrāsikā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ
T06srabhu_u:5039: durākhyāte dharmavinaye śīlavrataparāmarśaḥ, uccalito 'pi mithyāṃ pratipādayati yenāryamārgo notpadyate /
T06srabhu_u:5040: svākhyāte dharmavinaye vicikitsā, tatroccalitaś ca bhavati, na ca mithyāpratipanno 'pi tv anabhyāsāt tasya yāvad yathābhūtadarśanaṃ na
T06srabhu_u:5041: bhavati jñeye vastuni tāvat kāṅkṣā vimatayo vibandhakarā bhavanti (Śbh II
T06srabhu_u:5045: tasyāsya srota-āpannasya paraṃ sapta bhavā avaśiṣṭā bhavanti /
T06srabhu_u:5046: sa cāsya janmaprabandho yadā ca janmaprābandhikān kleśān prajahāti devabhavasaṃgṛhītān manuṣyabhavasaṃgṛhītāṃś ca, yeṣāṃ prahāṇāt param ekaṃ devabhavam abhinirvartayaty ekaṃ manuṣyabhavam /
T06srabhu_u:5048: yadā tu devabhavam eva kevalam abhinirvartayati, ihapratyāgamajanmikaṃ kleśaṃ prahāya, tadānāgāmiphalaṃ vyavasthāpyate //
T06srabhu_u:5050: tat punaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ trayāṇām saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād rāgadveṣamohānāṃ ca tanutvād bhagavatā vyavasthāpitam, pañcānām avarabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād anāgāmiphalam, paryādāya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhattvaphalam /
T06srabhu_u:5052: tatra ye rāgadveṣamohamānavitarkacariteṣu pudgaleṣu pūrvaṃ tāvac (Śbh II
T06srabhu_u:5053: 242) caritaviśodhana ālambane caritaṃ viśodhayitavyaṃ tataḥ paścāc
T06srabhu_u:5055: teṣāṃ pratiniyatam eva tad ālambanam avaśyaṃ tais tenālambanena prayoktavyam /
T06srabhu_u:5056: samabhāgacaritasya tu yatra priyārohitā tatra tena prayoktavyaṃ kevalaṃ cittasthitaye, na tu caritaviśuddhaye /
T06srabhu_u:5060: samabhāgacarito nāticireṇa, mandarajaskas tv āśu tvaritatvaritaṃ cittasthitim adhigacchati
T06srabhu_u:5062: samabhāgacaritasya pudgalasya mandarajaskasya ca katamāni liṅgāni /
T06srabhu_u:5064: samabhāgacaritasya pudgalasya sarvāṇi tāni liṅgāni saṃvidyante yāni rāgādicaritānām, tāni rāgādīni tu nādhimātrāṇi na pradhānāni yathā rāgādicaritānām /
T06srabhu_u:5065: samaprāptāni tāni bhavanti, pratyayeṣu satsu prajñāyante //
T06srabhu_u:5068: prasādabahulo medhāvī puṇyavān guṇānvitaś ca bhavati //
T06srabhu_u:5070: tatra trīṇy āvaraṇāni karmāvaraṇaṃ kleśāvaraṇaṃ vipākāvaraṇam /
T06srabhu_u:5072: yac cānyad api kiṃcit karma saṃcetanīyaṃ gurukarma vipakvavipākaṃ mārgotpattaye nibandhakārakam
T06srabhu_u:5074: yā dṛṣṭe dharme caritaviśodhanenālambanaviśodhanena na śakyate viśodhayitum /
